body:
Collega’s,

Voor onze klant Telenet te Mechelen zoek ik 3 extra Data Warehouse consultants die zo snel mogelijk kunnen starten tot einde 2022.

Deze extra nood is omwille van :

  *   Cloud migratie van hun ERP. Hierdoor moeten data flows worden aangepast of gebouwd. Hier zoek ik naar een versterking van 1 extra BI data engineer.
  *   Voor de go live van de back-office applicatie moeten ze voor de data scientists heel wat nieuwe features bouwen. Concreet zoek ik hier 2 extra data engineers om hen te versterken bij deze workload.
Hieronder kan je de normale jobdescriptie vinden voor een dergelijk profiel.

Job description
•      Turn raw data into trustworthy analytical datasets, that decreases time to market towards insights and reduces the TCO of data consumption
•      Manage these datasets (and the related data pipeline) as a product with all the responsibilities that comes with it:
o    own a part of the data product roadmap, which we prioritize as a team on a quarterly basis to fuel the overall company roadmap & initiatives with analytics
o    fit our data products with the overall data architecture, governance, standards & guidelines
o    design, build & test our data products
…meeting the functional & non-functional requirements,
…meeting the high standards for data ingestion, processing & storage
…and applying the right level of trust (quality, privacy, security) for their purpose
o    communicate on a regular basis to our stakeholders to increase data product awareness & usage
•      Strive continuously to reduce business as usual & keeping the lights on efforts through
data innovation & automation…
•      …freeing up time to co-create on our big value transformation cases together with data & analytics experts (like insights & reporting analysts, CRM, data scientists, application owners, functional/business analysts,…)
•      Work in a young & dynamic team of analysts & engineers, operating in a self- organizing agile at company scale context and within a large internal & external data ecosystem

We are looking for
a passionate, motivated, proactive, eager to learn data enthusiast that says what’s what, works better together, can set things in motion and who is at his/her best in a very challenging, innovative, flexible & dynamic company and Telecom industry, having:
•      5+ years of experience in a Data or Software Engineer role
•      Ideally attained a graduate or master’s degree in computer science, informatics, information systems, statistics or another analytical oriented education.

•      Experience in
o    Designing, building, testing and optimizing data pipelines in a Data Warehousing / Business Intelligence / Data Mart … context
o    ETL processes & tools (e.g. IBM InfoSphere Data Stage, DBT, …)
o    Oracle SQL
•      Working knowledge of below technologies is a plus:
o    Unix
o    Cloud:
            Snowflake
            AWS Redshift Step Functions, Cloudformation, S3, …
o    Methodologies as Agile Scrum, DevOps, …
o    BI tools (Qlik Sense)
o    Kafka, NiFi, Python, Java, Scala, …
o    The Communications Logical Data Model (CLDM) of Teradata
•      The right ethical mindset with regards to data privacy, security & governance
•      Fluent in English. Dutch is a plus.

Gr



Account Manager

CRONOS NV
Veldkant 33A
2550 KONTICH

M

body:
ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB



Hallo collega’s,



Voor Swift zoeken we Business/Funct. Analyst (1. Junior (1-3)) SWI000578  die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:
Uiterste reactiedatum: 30/09/2022
Gewenste startdatum: 01/09/2022
Einddatum: 31/12/2022
Referentie: SWI000578
Titel: Business/Funct. Analyst (1. Junior (1-3)
Locatie: The Netherlands - Zoeterwoude (Energieweg 33, 2382 NC Zoeterwoude, Nederland)
Status: Gepubliceerd
Type contract: Time & material

Aantal personen: 1
Afdeling: Technology Platform (TP)

Omschrijving

About the Role

Reporting to the Manager of the Cloud Business Office, the Cloud and Hosting Services Analyst for SWIFT will be helping to collect and analyze data to provide Cloud financial insights critical to our success as a business as it relates to an Infrastructure and Operations organization.

Responsibilities:

-Produce insightful reports that can be shared with and actioned by Management
-Work effectively with cross-functional teams globally, assimilating requirements, driving results in the form of data insights and building strategic partnerships
-Support the FinOps team with setting goals/KPIs, retrieving data and modeling
-Act as the technical expert for the Cost Transparency tools/dashboards. This includes configuring functionality, creating/enhancing visualizations, maintaining design and guidance documentation, and providing support
-Partner heavily with our Cloud Governance team to map data process flows, allowing FinOps to gather a single source of data source
-Analyze and forecast cloud hosting costs
-Provide cost optimization recommendations
-Create and maintain month-end and quarter-end reports
-Use Agile methodology for planning and execution
-Leverage the Cloud Financial Management (CFM) tools, interpret the findings, and make technical recommendations to the business application teams to help reduce ongoing cost

Professional Skills:

-Experience with automation technologies for CI/CD (Jenkins, Azure DevOps, AWS Code pipeline)
-Experience with visualization tools (e.g., QuickSight, Power BI)
-Knowledge of cloud cost products (e.g., Cost Explorer, Azure Portal)
-Experience with Python, JSON, YAML, ARM, Cloud Formation
-Knowledge of cloud management and governance tools (e.g., Cloud Custodian, Trusted Advisor)
-Familiarity with monitoring tools such as CloudWatch, CloudTrail, etc.
-Detail-oriented with excellent documentation skills/methodologies, who can successfully manage multiple priorities
-Demonstrable high level of intellectual curiosity, external perspective, and innovation interest
-Strong communication skills, including the ability to articulate complex technical topics to a non-technical or leadership audience

Qualifications:

-Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or related field
-2+ years working in cloud computing or IT infrastructure/platforms or Finance role
-2+ years of experience with AWS and/or Azure




Vaardigheden

SPECIFIEKE VAARDIGHEDEN

AWS or Azure certification:   Ja
Cloud computing or IT infrastructure/platforms or Finance role:   Junior (1-3) ( 2,00 jaar )
Cloud cost management tools:   Junior (1-3) ( 2,00 jaar )







Indien jullie geschikte kandidaten hebben ontvang ik graag hun beschikbaarheid, CV en kostprijs.

Alvast hartelijk bedankt.





Kind regards,

[http://media.gutsglory.be/cronos/signatures/201606_cronos/cronos-groep.png]
Esma 
Key Account Manager

body:
Beste,

Voor een klant in Brussel zoeken we een data analyst :

In our data team we are looking for temporary reinforcements to help us set up new reporting linked to the deployment of new applications.
We're looking for polyvalent data specialists who can switch easily from one system to another.

Example of tasks for which we need extra resources:
- Support the setup of reports based on Microsoft Dynamics data + migration\/rebuilt of reports based on old CRM solution.
- Be actor + coordinate the creation of reports (backend & frontend) based on new IT applications.eg: replacement of old application
- Analyse business needs and make proposal to answer to these needs.
- Improve current reports\/data solutions


The technical skills we are looking for are :
- Good understanding of E2E report construction (from ingestion to final report)
- Power BI (backend & frontend)
- Microsoft Dynamics (for reporting\/data aspects)
- SQL
- AWS\/Redshift

Generic skills required:
- able to understand complex systems
- ability to understand\/challenge business requirements and to make propositions
- able to speak business and IT language
- good communication skills
- EN + NL or\/and FR
- ability to synthesise
- Autonomy
- Curiosity
- dare to ask questions

Mvg,

Mireille De Keuleneir
Key Account Manager

body:
Dag collega’s,
Voor DHL zijn we op zoek naar een Medio Power Bi Developer. Maximaal IC tarief is 575€.
Cv’s graag naar Elke Audooren en mezelf,
Graag enkel Payroll medewerkers en directe freelancers,

Met vriendelijke groeten,
Sylvie



At DHL express the BICOE team is looking for a Medior Power BI Developer to assist with the implementation of Power BI.
You will be responsible for the development of new and existing Power BI datasets and reports. You will investigate potential improvements of the (Direct Query) reports to increase productivity.
Additionally, you will aid in the implementation of best practices within DHL and the structure of the Power BI environment.
To that end, the following skills are required for this position:
·    Experience with Power BI desktop and the Power BI service
·    Knowledge and understanding of frequently used DAX functions
oCALCULATE, RANK, DATESYTD, …
·    Knowledge of Power Query
·    Dashboarding & visualization experience (general report design, buttons, bookmarks, field parameters)
·    Knowledge of Kimball Data modelling and the creation of datasets within Power BI
·    Experience with the configuration of datasets and reports in the Power BI service (access, refreshes, …)
Additionally, the following skills are considered a nice plus for the job:
·    A feel for dashboard\/report lay-out and visualizing diverse types of data
·    Experience with SQL
·    Familiarity with the Power Query M language
·    Familiarity with several data sources (Snowflake, SQL server, Teradata)
·    Knowledge of Power BI Paginated Reports or SQL Server Reporting Services
·    Good documentation skills
You will be working in a multinational environment and as part of a multilingual team. As such, you are required to be fluent in both English and Dutch.




iPerform
##################@email.com<mailto:##################@email.com>
Mobile: +32 497 05 35 89

body:
Collega’s,

Voor D’Ieteren, vestiging Kortenberg zoeken we een Big Data Analyst die voldoet aan volgende profielbeschrijving:

Description:

For our Insights & Analytics department we're looking for a: Big Data Analyst

  *   Together we cover the reporting, insights & analysis for the complete after sales business, consisting out of:

  *   The sales in Belgium of genuine parts and accessories for Volkswagen, Audi, Volkswagen Commercial Vehicles, SEAT, CUPRA, Skoda and Porsche brands.

  *   Dealer data: the complete view on our dealer network giving their best support and service to our end customers and their car.

  *   weCare contracts : the official extended warranty or service contracts we offer to our customers, in order to give them the opportunity to optimize the budget for the maintenance or repair costs.

  *   Warranty business: the 2-5 year legal or extended warranty, as the roadside assistance we offer to our customers

Key responsibilities:

  *   You collect our stakeholders business requirements and translate them into data, relations, and translate them in insights for the business

  *   You are not afraid to challenge the business on the relevancy of the request

  *   You know your data: you can identify and select the correct data in our datawarehouse environment

  *   You provide data based insights to support data-based business decisions

Skills

  *   You have at least 7 years of experience in data

  *   Good at creation of technical and business documentations (definitions, measures descriptions, ...)

  *   Advanced Knowledge of Databricks \/ big data environments :
     *   SQL
     *   Python or R code

  *   Good understanding of databases, experience with SQL

  *   Meticulous in data validation

  *   Experienced in creating insights out of data

  *   Language : Fluent in Dutch and\/or French, English common use mainly in the reports

  *   You can work autonomously on dedicated tasks but you also pay attention to their dependencies while working with your teammates on collaborative assignments with deadlines.

  *   You are proactive and take ownership of the assigned business area by monitoring the use and performance of the BI solutions, optimize or correct it when necessary.

Roles:

  *   Senior Big Data Analyst Most recent experience   This year

Skills:

  *   Azure Data Factory Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   This year
  *   Databricks Level   Advanced   Most recent experience   This year
  *   DataWarehouse \/ BI Level   Advanced   Most recent experience   This year
  *   MySQL Level   Advanced   Most recent experience   This year
  *   Power BI Level   Advanced   Most recent experience   This year
  *   Python\/R Level   Advanced   Most recent experience   This year
  *   SQL Level   Advanced   Most recent experience   This year

Languages:

  *   Dutch or French Level   Native or bilingual proficiency
  *   English Level   Full professional proficiency

Location:
Main address: Leuvensesteenweg, 639 - 3071 Kortenberg
PARTIALLY REMOTE

Duurtijd: 01\/04\/2024 - 31\/12\/2024, 9 months, (part time 3\/5)
Richttarief: 700€ - 840€\/ dag (eindprijs)

Deadline voor indiening: 26\/03\/2023

Alvast hartelijk dank om de CV’s + kostprijs + beschikbaarheid van jullie potentiële kandidaten te bezorgen.

met vriendelijke groet,

Angelo Jacobs
Business Development Manager

Dear,


Role category -
Role profile
 S5 - Data
 Data Reporting & Visualisation - Expert
Job title
 Data Reporting & Visualisation - Expert - PowerBI -
Work location
 BRU.-CHANCELLERIE
 MONTAGNE DU PARC 8
 1000 BRUXELLES
Start date
 01\/04\/2024
End date
 30\/06\/2024
Description

Mission context

Data Reporting & Visualisation - Expert - PowerBI


Inspection Générale, the internal audit department is looking for assistance to develop their internal dashboarding and data analytics use cases in PowerBI

Function  description

Support the internal customers and realize several different data reporting and visualization projects by:

·    Understanding and identifying, together with the stakeholders, their vizualization and reporting needs,
·    Capturing the requirements and translating them into a prototype and a full dashboard,
·    Collecting and assembling the data in support of prototyping of vizualizations with the customer,
·    Developing, updating, optimizing, publishing & decommissioning (= full life-cycle) of dashboards\/reports respecting the data & reporting governance guidelines,
·    Striving for the most optimal solution for the development and automation of  reports and dashboard
·    Collaborating with Data Engineers in creating the adequate sustainable data solutions and\/or having the existing ones evolve in line with new needs (data assets) underlying recurrent and\/or critical reportings  (regulatory, strategic, tactical and\/or operational), in line with the data strategy whenever relevant), and as such promoting reuse and consistency (versus silo’s),
·    Setting-up, advocating and implementing reporting and vizualization best practices, according to the guidelines and standards defined within BNPPF,
·    Coaching junior Data VIzualization Specialists
·    Being the guardian & ambassador of this governance put in place,
·    Documenting and training users on how to effectively maximize the different tools.
Although the Data Vizualisation Specialist can temporarily be in charge of light data preparation work whilst designing and prototyping his new and updated reportings and visuals, he will collaborate closely with the Data Engineer for the delivery of the solid, industrialised and governed final data structures, guaranteeing traceability, consistency, monitoring.
Language requirements
Dutch
Fluent
French
Fluent
English
Fluent
Education


  *   Master degree
Certification


  *   A Microsoft certification in PowerBI + PowerTools is an asset.
Travel
None
Telework


  *   Expectation: 50% on site & 50% homeworking
Required experience \/ knowledge


  *   The candidate must have a proven track record in developing and maintaining PowerBI dashboarding solutions.
Technical experience
mandatory
PowerBI, PowerQuery, PowerBI workspace management.
preferable

Business experience
mandatory

preferable

Soft skills
Didactic skills are an asset.





Please submit your candidate in the attached template!

Tx!

Kristin Heymans

Dear ,


Role category -
Role profile

 Business analyst - Senior
Job title
 Business Analyst
Work location

Start date
 asap

Description

Mission context

BUSINESS ANALYST


Axepta is in a scale-up phase, requiring IT projects to continue the set-up of all the systems needed to develop new products, but with the need to document all the necessary to ensure a good evolution and maintenance of the installed base.
Function  description


  *   Responsible for elicitation, analysis and documentation of business, stakeholder, solution and transition requirements.
  *   You communicate with the business to gather the needs and identify impacts on the existing business processes.
  *   Your analysis leads to the definition of the solution, thanks to your collaboration with the IT architects and all other stakeholders (IT team, suppliers, business departments…).
  *   Your work includes the modelling of the TO-BE process and the impact assessment at data management level (data flows, data classification, GDPR…).
  *   You participate in the elaboration of RFC’s for small changes, or even business cases if it requires new projects, by providing the scope of the target solution, the estimate of the cost & effort, the evaluation of the risk index value, etc.
  *   Once the board has given his GO to proceed, you translate the Business needs into functional requirements (user stories) and functional specifications to make them actionable by the IT solution suppliers.
  *   You create and execute test cases to validate deliveries and give your support to the Business Key User for the acceptance tests.
  *   In some projects you could be assigned the role of test manager, by taking care to follow the governance rules.
  *   You ensure that all the required documentation is up to date before going live (business process, functional specifications, user stories, data related documentation, knowledge base for operations).
  *   The business analysis team also has the responsibility to make the follow-up of business procedures to be updated by the business, to comply with policies of our head office (BNP Paribas Fortis).
  *   Thanks to the knowledge you will acquire on the system, you'll prepare some Data reporting for the business.

Dutch

French

mandatory

  *   Good expertise in MS Office, able to play easily with data in MS-Excel
  *   Good understanding of IT and testing
  *   Experience with data reporting (Tableau, Tableau CRM, PowerBI)
  *   Experience with requirements management
preferable


  *   Knowledge of Salesforce (Sales Cloud, Marketing Cloud, Billing, CPQ...).
Business experience
mandatory

·       BPM has not secret for you.
·       Proven experience as analyst in projects related to Sales & Finances activities.
·       Business case elaboration
·       Scrum
preferable


  *   Knowledge of some standard like ITIL, Six Sigma...
Soft skills


  *   Analytical mind – conceptual thinking

Description

Data Analyst
Mission context


Axepta gains maturity at level of data management and BI reporting .
An experienced Data (& Business) Analyst is needed in this context.


  *

Her\/his main focus will be to support business in the creation & documentation of various reporting (Payment transactions, Accounting, KYC, Logistics...).


  *

The analyst will also have the opportunity to takes part in some business\/functional analyses too.

Function  description
As an analyst, (s)he should be able to :

  *   Get a clear view of all the data sources available in Axepta environment.
  *   Communicate efficiently with business departments to gather, understand and translate business needs into clear requirements.

As a Data Analyst, (s)he should be able to :

  *   Identify which data are required to build the expected reporting
  *   Build reports via Tableau CRM (Salesforce), Tableau or Power BI.
  *   Export, merge and transform data into Excel (with Power Query) when it cannot be made through usual tools (e.g. in case of data migration from outer systems).
  *   Ensure data quality by implementing controls on the imported data.
  *   Discover trends and patterns that could bring value to the business.
  *   Organize and document functionally implemented reports.

As a Business Analyst (secondary role), (s)he should be able to :

  *   Meet and communicate with IT & business stakeholders to assess the impact of and possible solutions to the deduced requirements.
  *   Analyse and document business processes by using BPM methods.
  *   Analyse and documents functional impacts (functional specs, data flow, data dictionary...)
  *   Execute functional tests, and take occasionally the role of Test Manager.
  *   Support the business during User Acceptance tests.

body:
Beste P&C,

Voor een klant te Brussel hebben we volgende vacature openstaan. Wie heeft een geschikte kandidaat voor dit profiel.

Startdatum: 01\/04\/2024
Doorlooptijd: 01\/04\/2024 - 30\/09\/2024 met mogelijkheid tot verlenging
Bezetting: Full-time (40u) - remote & 2 dagen op kantoor

Role:
We are seeking an expert in Power BI and dimensional data modelling to support our BI & analytics teams.

Working on Business Intelligence means:
• Understand the business processes and challenges
• Translate business analytical needs into data requirements
• Explore, understand and combine data from multiple domains
• Define and implement structural data models to reduce the time to deliver reports and analysis
• Analyse and visualize the data to discover new and meaningful insights
• Build dashboards to monitor customer experience and operational performance

Profile
Technical Skills:
• Expert in Power BI
• Proven experience with Data Warehousing environments and proficiency in BI tools.
• Advanced knowledge of dimensional data modelling, SQL, and Power BI architecture.
• Familiarity with data visualization best practices.

General Competencies:
• Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts in an easy and understandable way.
• Capability to translate business requirements into efficient data models.
• At least 3 years of experience in a relevant domain
• You are fluent in Power BI
• You have expert knowledge of SQL, Data Warehouse environments and dimensional modelling.
• Experience with Teradata is a plus
• You consult with both “business” & “technical” stakeholders and easily bridge between both
• You can translate data coming from different complex IT sources into simple data models
• You are good at visualizing data and create impactful presentations that make the data speak
• You have good communication skills towards both management and operational levels
• You look at data from different angles, spontaneously look for patterns and make recommendations based on your findings
• You take responsibility, work independent and take initiative to consult the right people.

Languages:
Fluent in English and preferably also Dutch and\/or French.

Bij interesse, gelieve de CV en tarief door te sturen.


Met vriendelijke groeten,

Kind regards,

Beste collega’s,



Voor Euroclear zoeken we een Data Analyst - Supply Chain (4886) die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:





 Job Info

_____________________________________________________


Organization: Euroclear SA\/NV
Location: Belgium
Full or Part Time
Target start date: 3\/1\/24

Watch duty: No
Shifts? No
Travel Required: No
Weekend work: No
UK only- Watch duty - secondary
Reference Profile: non-IT Business Analyst Intermediate


 Job Details

_____________________________________________________

Your Part of the Deal

The Supply Chain department is currently working to implement a new data strategy which is heavily linked to a variety of ongoing initiatives related to tooling, regulation and the corporate data strategy.  Your role will be to support the data strategy lead in delivering such initiatives.  Activities include (but are not limited to) :


  *   Gathering and summarising data requirements; collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and objectives.
  *   Data cleansing large sets of data; Gather data from various sources, clean and reprocess data to ensure accuracy and reliability.
  *   Extracting, analysing and interpreting large datasets to drive actionable insights and enhance business decision-making processes.
  *   Analysing and plugging gaps within various data sets.
  *   Implementation of data requirements for existing and new tooling.
  *   Ensuring data governance principles are followed and documented.
  *   Create clear and informative data visualization, such as charts, graphs, dashboard to present findings and insights. Use of visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI…
  *   Communicate findings and recommendations to various stakeholders through reports, presentations, and data storytelling



Your Profile

You must have:


  *   Ability to quickly learn and navigate tools which are unfamiliar to you.
  *   Intermediate to advanced Microsoft Excel skills, with the ability to call on a range of formulas as and when required.
  *   Ability to clean, manipulate and prepare large data sets, for the purpose of reporting, gap analysis and data migration across tools.
  *   Excellent stakeholder skills
  *   The ability to challenge the status quo and existing rational.
  *   You are fluent in written and oral English.


Additional skills:


  *   You are able to work autonomously.
  *   You are able to work under pressure and can cope with strict deadlines, you have a hands-on approach.
  *   You can successfully prioritize tasks and coordinate several priorities at once.
  *   You are a pro-active team player.
  *   You have strong interpersonal skills


Other advantageous skills


  *   You have experience within procurement related functions

  *   You have experience with supplier related data.

Role category -
Role profile
 S5 - Data
 Data Engineer - Senior
Job title
 Data Engineer
Work location
 BRU.-MONTAGNE DU PARC\/WARANDEBERG
 MONTAGNE DU PARC 3
 1000 BRUXELLES
Start date
 01\/02\/2024
End date
 31\/12\/2024
Description

Mission context

Data Engineer


As Tribe CRM Individuals & Master Data (CRM-I & MDM) our objective is to deliver the best personalized, trusted, compliant and frictionless interactions during all moments of the customer lifecycle. The Tribe’s responsibilities include customer lifecycle management, sales and servicing enablement through CRM tooling, safeguarding master data quality and related consent and enabling transversal banking products.

As Data Engineer you will be a key contributor in preparing and making data available in a safe and secure manner, for multiple uses by Businesses and Functions, and for multiple purposes – campaigns, reports, analyses and\/or applications. It contributes to significant productivity improvements for all the Businesses and Functions that consume or use data. You will be active in the domain of CRM, where the availability of the right data is essential to perform successful marketing campaigns and to be able to have meaningful discussions with customers.


You will be part of the squad CRM Data Solutions which have the following mission :
· Management & evolution of:
oA datawarehouse for CRM, Analytics & BI
oA campaign orchestration tool (Adobe Campaign Classic)

· Make sure data is available and usable in the Marketing Data Warehouse (MDWH) and Adobe Campaign
· Monitor data integration and transformation
· Ensure Functional & Technical support to our internal clients on MDWH, CRM analytical platform and Adobe Campaign
Function description
Your main objectives are:

Data Warehouse :

  *   To collect business requirements through various requirements techniques
  *   To translate them into an efficient Data solution by designing data flows, data models and data stores\/data sets, mapping rules, access mechanisms, …
  *   To analyse the best “golden” sources of data and define the business and technical rules on how to integrate them
  *   To prototype the solution in order to support the business validation
  *   To design and develop the “logical” and “physical” data models and data stores, and to industrialise the feeding and deliveries from the integrated data stores (datawarehouse, datamarts, data sets)…
  *   To streamline these data pipelines across the enterprise, for maximum usage throughout the company or business\/function

Campaign orchestration:

  *   To collect business requirements through various requirements techniques
  *   To translate them into requirements for the Adobe developer
  *   Monitor the data loading in Adobe and propose improvements
  *   To analyse and improve campaign workflows
  *   Support business in the process of launching campaigns (workflow, content creation, follow-up of deliveries,… )

Good

Good
English
Fluent

  *   You have at least a Master’s degree in a quantitative discipline, such as statistics, mathematics or engineering.
  *   Candidates with other academic backgrounds with substantial knowledge of analytics are also encouraged to apply).
Required experience \/ knowledge
Technical experience
mandatory


  *   Knowledge of SQL programming language
  *   Data modeling (Powerdesigner, another accepted standard tool)
  *   Knowledge of standard Reporting \/ Dashboard tools: BO, SAS, Tableau, ..
preferable

Business experience
mandatory


  *   Requirements management: capable of capturing, describing and managing functional and non-functional business requirements
  *   Functional analysis: capable of documenting systems functionalities
  *   Knowledge\/awareness of DATA, SECURITY and IT architecture concepts
  *   Experience in creating\/or optimizing workflows and data model in Adobe Campaign classic
preferable


  *   Hands-on experience with the Agile methodology
  *   Knowledge of project management tools (JIRA, Agile Central…)
Soft skills

Voor onze klant Fluxys zijn we op zoek naar een Power BI Developer.
Starten asap, lange termijn.

body:
Dag Ben,


Vanuit de VRT hebben we een aanvraag ontvangen voor een medior\/ senior data-analist. Indien je iemand geschikt hebben, graag:

  *   CV in Word (gewenste vaardigheden uit onderstaande matrix maximaal verwerken in de CV)
  *   IC tarief (inclusief jullie marge)
  *   Beschikbaarheid
  *   Vaste wn’er of freelancer
  *   Contactgegevens consultant



Deadline: 25\/01\/2024

Max. tarief: 108,40 EUR\/ excl. BTW

Regime: voltijds


Omschrijving

Het mediagebruik en -aanbod evolueert steeds sneller. De digitalisering zorgt voor enorme opportuniteiten. Er zijn ontelbare manieren om de mediagebruiker te informeren, te inspireren en te verbinden. Het is mogelijk om “media” terug uit te vinden, te experimenteren met nieuwe formaten, via slimme algoritmes te connecteren met verschillende doelgroepen, en aanbod te personaliseren zonder te vervallen in een meer-van-hetzelfde-logica.

VRT gaat deze uitdagingen aan en heeft hiervoor de laatste jaren ook een sterk data team uitgebouwd. Dit team zet in op de continue ontwikkeling en evolutie van het VRT profiel, bouwt aan een VRT data platform waarbij het verzamelen van data en het ontwikkelen van smaakverbredende algoritmes en machine learning modellen centraal staat, en last but not least helpt mee aan de uitrol van een datacultuur binnen VRT met behulp van BI activiteiten, data analyse en datagedreven CRM activiteiten.

Om dit Data & Intelligence verder uit te bouwen alsook te laten groeien in maturiteit, is VRT op zoek naar een data analist.


Wat verwachten we van jou?

In jouw rol als data analist speel je niet alleen een rol bij het begeleiden van strategische besluitvorming, je maakt ook het verschil voor de mediagebruiker inzake digitale ervaring, communicatie en interactie.
We verwachten van jou dat je creatief kan omgaan met data. Je ontdekt nieuwe perspectieven en ongebruikelijke inzichten uit onze datasets. Je zult op een agile manier nauw samenwerken met een team data analisten en data scientists om niet alleen antwoorden te vinden op bestaande vragen, maar ook om nieuwe vragen te formuleren die kunnen leiden tot innovatieve inzichten die de VRT kan helpen om nog meer datagedreven te worden.

Verantwoordelijkheden

Je identificeert nieuwe mogelijkheden om waardevolle inzichten uit data te halen door out-of-the-box te denken en creatieve analysemethoden te gebruiken. Je ontwikkelt en implementeert geavanceerde algoritmen en modellen om complexe datasets te verkennen en verborgen patronen te onthullen.  Je kan je bevindingen helder uitleggen aan minder data-savvy collega’s en je kan ze met inzichten enthousiasmeren om zelf ook met data aan de slag te gaan. Je kan je bevindingen op een begrijpelijke en overtuigende manier overbrengen, waarbij je inzichten worden vertaald naar bruikbare strategieën voor niet-technische stakeholders.

Wie ben jij?

Een afgeronde opleiding op het gebied van data-analyse, informatica, statistiek, data science of een gerelateerd vakgebied met ook liefst enkele jaren werkervaring. Uitstekende programmeervaardigheden met tools en talen zoals Python, R, SQL, en ervaring met datavisualisatie.  Aantoonbare creativiteit in het benaderen en interpreteren van gegevens om innovatieve oplossingen te genereren. Uitstekende communicatievaardigheden en het vermogen om complexe concepten op een begrijpelijke manier over te brengen. Je hebt ervaring met agile werken Je bent een teamplayer, je bent proactief en houdt ervan om te sparren met collega’s. Ervaring met de mediawereld is een troef.
Wil je een datacultuur mee uitdragen binnen VRT en strategisch mee nadenken hoe dit moet evolueren naar de toekomst toe? Dan willen we je graag spreken!

body:
Dag collega’s,

Voor Galapagos zijn we op zoek naar onderstaand profiel. Enkel payroll medewerkers of directe freelancers graag.

Pleased to meet you, we are Galapagos, a dynamic growing Biotech company with offices across Europe and in the US, headquartered in Mechelen, Belgium.

We’re in the business of changing lives. We go where no one has ever gone in our quest to discover and develop life-improving medicines. In every challenge we face, we see new opportunities. We pioneer for patients. We need thought leaders and rapid thinkers, entrepreneurs in spirit and status quo-fighters: collaborative innovators and perseverant idealists. We need the best-in-class. In other words, we need you: The ‘make-it-happener’.

We are looking for a Data & Analytics Consultant

Scope of the job



  *   Supports the design, optimization and maintenance of the Quality & Supply Chain data reports from an architectural and visualization perspective
  *   Supports with introducing advanced data analytics technologies
  *   Support with data analytics projects (e.g. data warehouse implementation)

Your role



  *   Translating business requirements into user-friendly data reports and dashboards (Power BI)
  *   Support transfer of current BI reports to Datawarehouse interface
  *   Contributes to set up of data models in collaboration with business partners and the ITS department to allow reports and dashboards for the QM & SC department
  *   Back up maintenance of current setup dashboards
  *   Supports with optimization of manual processes
  *   Assess current data analytics capabilities and support with introducing advanced data analytics (e.g. data mining, big data analytics, predictive analytics, ..
  *   Interacts with D&A Lead and Operations & Strategy lead to provide status update and to align on the Datawarehouse migration project

Who are you?

General Skills



  *   Required Advanced Power BI knowledge
  *   Reports & Dashboarding
  *   Knowledge of SAP system
  *   Familiar with quality processes\/ previous experience in Pharma is a plus
  *   Experienced with advanced data analytics (e.g. data mining, big data analytics, predictive analytics, ..)
  *   Critical thinker

Language Skills



  *   English: Fluent in reading, writing, and speaking


Met vriendelijke groeten – Cordialement – Kind Regards,

body:
Collega’s

Voor onze klant Telenet te Mechelen zoek ik onderstaand profiel.

Start: februari 2024
Voltijds
Duur: 6 maanden

Ik zoek een BI analist om de rol van reporting & insights enabler voor het Finance domein (dwz finance, supply chain, procurement) op te nemen.

Het takenpakket ziet er als volgt uit:

  *   Samen met de ‘interne klanten’ (de finance teams dus) de scope en prioriteiten van het op te leveren werk bepalen
  *   Data collectie en validatie
  *   Definitie, bouw, automatisering, onderhoud en aanpassingen van reporting dashboards in QlikSense die de business ondersteunen
  *   Proactief uitreiken naar stakeholders rond operationele verbeteringen en noodzakelijke aanpassingen aan de dashboards in scope
  *   Uitvoeren van analyses om specifieke inzichten naar boven te krijgen

We zoeken hiervoor een business intelligence analyst met minimum 2-3 jaar relevante ervaring in het domein van finance, supply chain en procurement. Domeinkennis is echt een must.
Kennis van en ervaring met het opbouwen van reporting dashboards is uiteraard ook noodzakelijk (Power BI, Tableau,…).
Kennis van QlikSense is hierbij een troef, maar geen killer.

De opdracht is een interim opdracht, in afwachting van het invullen van deze positie met een interne medewerker.

Interviews worden volgende week ingepland dus aub tijdig reageren met vermelding van exacte beschikbaarheid en IC rate van de kandidaat.
Gr


Guy Van de Vel
Account Manager

End date
 30\/06\/2024
Description
 Developer for the Business Partner Solutions department
Mandatory knowledge:  Reporting tool (Tableau, Power BI..),SQL server, Data Analyze


Want to help shape the bank of tomorrow today?

Within the Finance Department of BNP Paribas Fortis and within the Finance Transversal Solution & Control entity – Business partner Solution, the End User Solutions team is looking for a candidate to ensure the role of developer and  business analyst in scope of  all Finance End user computing Tools by using  new technologies, Dashboarding & reporting (Python, DataIQ, Power BI), with main objective to grow towards: a more simplified group target architecture landscape in support of the plan 2025 project.

Your future job

The main responsibilities are:

·    Finding solutions to specific problems is one of your strengths : you are able to analyse \/ implement new requirements of the concerned stakeholders (finance users, external stakeholders) with collaboration of business analysts.
·    Technical analysing and comparing alternatives and writing them down in a solution document
·    Proposal and implementation of changes to improve  our existing tools, procedures\/process, closings with objective to simplify the current architecture & processes.
·    User support on production issues & questions
·    Documentation of procedures, process
·    Provide Training, guidance and user support (in change) on the concerned subjects
·    You are flexible in case of production issues.


Highlight your strengths

·    You have a Bachelor or a Master in IT and a knowledge of Finance by experiences is a surplus value.
·    You have at least 3 years of experience in SQL-server\/ Data Modelling\/Tuning (queries, TSQL) and   knowledge of  .net (C#, WPF). Being able to developer complex SQL queries is mandatory.
·    Knowledge of MS Access, Excel Advanced (ex.  Pivot Table, macros)
·    Knowledge of dashboarding tools (Tableau, Power BI, DataIQ)
·    You are able to review existing applications \/SQL-processes  to improve performance.
·    Creating generic code that works in many different programs
·    You are a team player
·    You are client focused
·    You have good analytical and synthesis skills;
·    You are a quick self-starter, pro-active & have a negotiating  attitude,
·    You have good Communication (written & spoken)  and influencing skills;
·    You have a great sense of autonomy, commitment and perseverance
·    You have the ability to work in a dynamic and multi-cultural environment
·    You are flexible, accurate, solution & control minded.
·    You speak fluently French or Dutch, English.

In a changing world, diversity and inclusion are core values. At BNP Paribas Fortis, we want to attract and retain women and men of all ages, from all backgrounds, each with his or her own experience. We firmly believe that diversity increases performance and innovation.

Collega’s,

Voor Engie zijn wij op zoek naar een BI & Power BI Specialist.

Startdatum: 15\/01\/2024
Einddatum: 31\/12\/2024
Locatie: Brussel

Description
We are looking for an BI specialist to play a key role in developing and implementing a self-service BI culture within M&S Belgium. The candidate will be responsible for training people of different business teams to develop their own dashboards and perform their own analyses using Power BI. The candidate will closely work with Data engineers developing data model to be used for Self-Service and Collibra specialist to govern the data.

Responsibilities

  1.  Promote and develop within some Business teams a Self-Service BI culture and use cases

     *   Collaborate with the business teams and to understand their data needs
     *   Establish methodology and governance protocols for the creation and use of dashboards and reports, in close collaboration with Data engineers modeling datamarts and Collibra expert to govern the data
     *   Design and implement a comprehensive training program for Power BI users.
     *   Train some specific end-users on the self-service BI and the developments of their own dashboard and analysis
     *   Provide ongoing support and guidance to Power BI users

  1.  Deliver support to end-users part of the Self-Service
  2.  Monitor the results of the Self-Service BI initiatives and tools and methodologies, making adjustments as necessary.

Voor Aquafin zijn wij op zoek naar een ervaren BI Analyst met ervaring in SAP S\/4HANA, SAP BI.

Startdatum: ASAP
Einddatum: 31\/12\/2023 (met kans op verlenging)
Locatie: Aartselaar

Taken

  *   Je versterkt het team dat instaat voor de datamodellering en Power BI rapporten ter ondersteuning van de business
  *   Je maakt functionele analyse van de brondata voor Data Engineers ter voorbereiding van de BI-noden

body:
Beste,

Voor Atrias (Brussel) zoeken we een Medior to senior “BI analyst & PowerBI Developer”


Gewenste startdatum: 30\/10\/2023

Einddatum: 05\/11\/2024


Ondersteuning van de rapporteringsservice binnen Atrias. Dit omvat zowel reactief als proactief service management via onze eigen inhouse Service Management Tool (TOPDesk). Opvolging van het operationele plan voor reporting. Meewerken aan de maturisatie van de reporting dienst.

Meewerken aan Correctief en Evolutief Maintenance:
- Ontwerp van (vnl. functionele, maar ook niet-functionele) testen voor de datasets, statische rapporten en dynamische dashboards in nauwe samenwerking met de product owner(s) – test design;
- Het uitvoeren van testen, het registreren en opvolgen van defecten – test uitvoering en defect mgmt;
- Het analyseren van defecten die gelogd werden door de gebruikers alvorens deze door te sturen naar het Atrias BI implementatieteam – defect mgmt;
- Het analyseren en opvolgen van (functionele) incidenten en problems – incident en problemmgmt;
- Het bouwen van rapporten in powerBI en automatiseren van flows via powerautomate


Technische context

  *   Azure datawarehouse met main components Azure Data Factory, Azure Data Lake Gen2, Azure SQL PaaS, databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics.
Voorgaande tools worden vooral door de service provider gebruikt maar kennis hiervan is een pluspunt.
  *   PowerBI & PowerAutomate zullen de voornaamste tools zijn
  *   Bronsystemen zijn vnl. message exchange (soap) based, batch process oriented, heavily customized off the shelf toepassingen.
  *   TOPDesk is een belangrijke bron.

Vaardigheden

·        Een aantoonbare ervaring met Microsoft PowerAutomate - Medior ( 2,00 jaar )

·        Een aantoonbare ervaring met Microsoft PowerBI Desktop (als ontwikkelaar) - Medior ( 5,00 jaar )

·        Een aantoonbare ervaring met TOPDesk - Junior ( 1,00 jaar )

·        Een aantoonbare werkervaring binnen een "waterfall" en een "agile" setting (jaren ervaring zijn cumulatief) - Medior ( 3,00 jaar )

·        Een aantoonbare ervaring en kennis met data preparatie (transformatie en processing technieken) - Medior ( 3,00 jaar )

·        Een aantoonbare ervaring in het lezen en begrijpen van data modelering in LDM formaat en deze te implementeren in een ETL - Medior ( 5,00 jaar )

·        Kennis van datawarehouseconcepten

·        Een aantoonbare ervaring met de MIG6 Marktstandaard - Medior ( 3,00 jaar )

·        Een aantoonbare goede kennis van het Engels: Moet in staat zijn om correct en vloeiend te communiceren (lezen en schrijven) in het Engels

·        Een aantoonbare goede kennis van het Nederlands of Frans

Geel = ‘must have’ vaardigheden

 MONTAGNE DU PARC 3

Description

Mission context


Hands-on Mid-Senior Project Manager with great affinity for data measurement projects, from data measurement projects, from data flow setup to transformation to PowerBI dashboard.


Mission Objective:


The implementation of an insourced data lake in which external cleaned media agency data of ATL and BTL campaign data and social media is centralised, combined with internal data sources, covering all relevant communication channels. When implemented, PowerBI reporting\/montoring dashboards need to be created.
Function  description

Support the internal customers and realize several different data reporting and visualization projects by:

·    Understanding and identifying, together with the stakeholders, their visualization and reporting needs,
·    Capturing the requirements and translating them into a prototype and a full dashboard,
·    Collecting and assembling the data in support of prototyping of visualizations with the customer,
·    Developing, updating, optimizing, publishing & decommissioning (= full life-cycle) of dashboards\/reports respecting the data & reporting governance guidelines,
·    Striving for the most optimal solution for the development and automation of  reports and dashboard
·    Collaborating with Data Engineers in creating the adequate sustainable data solutions and\/or having the existing ones evolve in line with new needs (data assets) underlying recurrent and\/or critical reportings  (regulatory, strategic, tactical and\/or operational), in line with the data strategy whenever relevant), and as such promoting reuse and consistency (versus silo’s),
·    Setting-up, advocating and implementing reporting and visualization best practices, according to the guidelines and standards defined within BNPPF,
·    Coaching junior Data Visualization Specialists
·    Being the guardian & ambassador of this governance put in place,
·    Documenting and training users on how to effectively maximize the different tools.
Although the Data Visualisation Specialist can temporarily be in charge of light data preparation work whilst designing and prototyping his new and updated reportings and visuals, he will collaborate closely with the Data Engineer for the delivery of the solid, industrialised and governed final data structures, guaranteeing traceability, consistency, monitoring.

At DHL express the BICOE team is looking for a Medior Power BI Developer to assist with the implementation of Power BI.
You will be responsible for the development of new and existing Power BI datasets and reports. You will investigate potential improvements in performance of the (Direct Query) reports to increase productivity. Additionally, you will aid in the implementation of best practices within DHL and the structure of the Power BI environment.
To that end, the following skills are required for this position:

oCALCULATE, RANK, DATESYTD, …

Additionally, the following skills are considered a nice plus for the job:

You will be working in a multinational environment and as part of a multilingual team. As such, you are required to be fluent in both English and Dutch.

body:
Collega’s,

Voor Elia zijn wij op zoek naar 3 Medior to Senior Data Engineers voor de System Operation Data Team.

Startdatum: 16\/10\/2023
Einddatum: 28\/02\/2025
Locatie: Brussel

Description
The Elia Group is moving towards Data-oriented organization, i.e. Data becomes a masterpiece in its strategy execution, as a Data-driven company. Within the corporate Digital & Data department, we aim at facilitating and driving the entire organization to leverage data as an enabler to achieve its targets (strategic ambitions, innovation or transformation themes, objectives, and regulatory compliance).

Our mission consists in facilitating and driving the entire organization to leverage data as an enabler to achieve its targets:

  *   Creating business value through Data
  *   Think Data intuitively
  *   Unlock transversal Data fit for purpose

System Operation Data team:
The system operation initiative of the Data Platform is operationalized via the “System Operation Data Product Team”. The focus of this initiative is to collect, curate, and serve all data that is relevant for improving the reliability and efficiency of real-time grid operation and control. For example, this comprises the handling of forecasting time series of wind, solar, system imbalance, and frequency.

The team very closely works together with the Center of Excellence for Artificial Intelligence to create the underlying forecasting models. Among other projects in 2022, the System Operation Product of the Data Platform developed the communication infrastructure for PICASSO and realized the Simplify project which publishes the system imbalance forecast for the next two quarters, every minute. In the period 2024 to 2027, the initiative will support and enable all existing and new data-driven business initiatives of the System Operation department.

Requirements
What the consultant will be doing and for which competences he\/she will need an Extensive hands-on experience (> 3 to 5 years preferable) in 2 out of the 4 following categories:

  *   Implementing solutions with on-premise data technologies stack from Microsoft (SSIS, SSAS, and SQL Server)
  *   Implementing advanced solutions with Power BI (DAX, M language, Visualizations, …)
  *   Implementing data pipelines using Azure services such as Azure Databricks, but also to some extent Azure Data Factory, Azure Functions, Azure Stream Analytics, and Azure DevOps
  *   Implementing data pipelines or data enrichments with Python in a Databricks environment
  *   Open to learn and jump on new technologies (on the ones listed above, or also Neo4j, Apache Arrow, …)
  *   Able and willing to interact with business analysts and stakeholders to refine some requirements and also present the solution
  *   Able and willing to contribute to automated testing of the solution
  *   Able and willing to contribute to the documentation

What the consultant will NOT be doing:

  *   Act from an Ivory Technical Tower.
  *   Make decisions for the Business but rather advise them with careful logic or showing your reasoning.

Non-technical skills

  *   Customer-oriented
  *   Strong communication skills
  *   Product-oriented mindset
  *   Fluent in English AND one of the 3 following languages, Dutch\/French\/German.

Alvast bedankt voor de feedback omtrent mogelijke kandidaten.

Mvg,

Johanna Asuncion
Business and Sales Support
De Cronos Groep nv
Veldkant 33a
B-2550 Kontich
0497\/16.09.55
##################@email.com

Division
Group Digital Capabilities (GDC)

The Business Intelligence Center of Expertise (BI CoE) seats within the GDC Tribe "Analytics Insights & Reporting" (AIR).

The BI CoE is in charge of the development of Management, Regulatory and Client reports through Cognos and Power BI.

The key skill required to work in the BI CoE is to be interested by both the business world and the IT world. For that reason, we are looking for a person with an IT background and a strong business interest.

You know how to

body:
Collega’s,

Voor Fluvius zijn wij op zoek naar 1 Data Engineer en 1 Data Analist.

Startdatum: 04\/09\/2023
Duurtijd: 1 jaar
Locatie: Melle

Beschrijving
We zijn op zoek naar 1 Data Engineer en 1 Data Analist die samen een tandem vormen om enerzijds als data analist, een business behoefte die voornamelijk proces gedreven is kan capteren, analyseren en interpreteren, om zo te vertalen in een data behoefte. Anderzijds een Data engineer die vanuit een conceptuele data architectuur met bijhorend business contextmodel een logisch datamodel kan uittekenen, mappen op de verschillende databronnen, bouwen van de nodige informatie- en analyseblokken. Om daarna in PowerBI de nodige visualisaties te kunnen uitvoeren.

Technische context
Fluvius werkt aan de opbouw van een dataplatform in Microsoft Azure Cloud om diverse
applicaties naar te connecteren en de analyse-componenten van Ms Azure Cloud te gebruiken om hierop (advanced) analytics te doen, operationele en strategische rapporten te bouwen, dashboard met LTI, KPI enz …

De opbouw van het dataplatform dat we de naam Athena gegeven hebben, evenals de organisatie daarvoor opzetten zit al in een ver gevorderde stadia.
We hopen hiermee ook de verscheidenheid van BI tools en omgevingen terug te dringen. De eerste databronnen koppelen, datasets beschikbaar stellen en vertalen naar zinvolle, betekenisvolle informatieblokken is al een succes. Documentatie maken we op in Enterprise Architect, Confluence en Jira.

Profielen
1 Junior Data Engineer
Onze verlangens voor een data-analist, hij beschikt over sterke analytische vaardigheden, kennis van statistiek, een goed begrip van datawarehousing, en het vermogen om complexe technische concepten te vertalen naar begrijpelijke bevindingen voor niet-technische belanghebbenden.

Volgende tools, methodes en begrippen zijn voor jou dagelijkse kost: datavisualisatie tools als voorbeeld Tableau, UML, softwarebibliotheken als voorbeeld Pandas, Pändera, CRISP-DM, ...
Ervaring in de energiesector is mooi meegenomen.

1 Medior Data Analist
Om succesvol te zijn als data engineer, is het belangrijk voor ons om een sterke kennis van gegevensarchitectuur en -ontwerp te hebben, programmeervaardigheden, ervaring met databasebeheer en gegevensbeheer, evenals een goed begrip van de behoeften van data-analyse en dataverwerking binnen de specifieke context van ons bedrijf.

Volgende tools, methodes of begrippen zijn voor jou dagelijkse kost: Terraform, Bicep, Pandas, Numpy, SQL, ETP pipelines, PowerBI, Databricks, Oracle DB, ...

Alvast bedankt voor de feedback.

body:
Beste P&C,

Ter vervangen van een van onze consultants zijn we op zoek naar een MS BI Developer te Brussel.

Microsoft BI Developer – Profile description
Function Description
Microsoft BI developer to integrate in its agile development teams.
The objective of these teams is to supply services for a series of critical core-applications for gas
flow management:
 New Product development
 Enhancements on existing products
 Support existing products
The candidate will be involved in all aspects of the services, including new developments,
technical upgrades, bug resolution and incident management.
Based on detailed analysis the candidate will develop and optimize high-performance
datawarehouses, ETL processes and reports. The candidate will also participate in the technical
design of the solution in collaboration with the technical lead. Ideally the candidate will have
relevant experience in corporate-wide projects.
Responsibilities
 Actively participate in the Scrum-based development team
 Design and implement new functionalities and maintain existing ones.
 Realize end user support. Help in bug finding and resolution.
 Collaborate with operations teams to deploy and configure the software in production.
Technical Skills
 Ability to develop and maintain Microsoft SQL Server datawarehouses, SSIS packages,
SSRS reports and SSAS databases
 Ability to dive deep into performance-related issues
 Ability to optimize models and processes using an analytical approach
 3+ years experience using the following technologies:
o Microsoft SQL Server 2012 (or higher)
 Database Engine
 Integration Services
 Reporting Services
 Analysis Services Multi-Dimensional (Tabular is a must)
 Data Tools for Business Intelligence
 Management Studio
 T-SQL
 Performance tuning
o Microsoft Excel Pivot Tables
o Visual Studio 2015 (or higher)
 Basic knowledge of the following technologies:
o Oracle PL\/SQL
o Team Foundation Server
 Good knowledge of C# .NET development is a plus
 Experience working with GIT as version control system is a plus
 Experience working with Microsoft PowerBI or similar reporting tools is a plus
 Experience working with Data Analytics tools as Microsoft Azure Machine Learning,
DataIku, Microstrategy is a plus
 Experience working with R or Python as data science programming language is a plus
Personal Skills & Mindset
 Be an active team player within the scrum team (pair programming, code reviews, team
discussion, refinements, …) who understands that creating great software is a team effort
 Be able to focus your efforts to deliver customer value. Be able to work according to the
priorities set by the product owner.
 Have an open and transparent mindset to allow for continuous improvement
 Live by the boy scouts rule: always leave code in a better state than the way you found it
 Be able to learn the complex business model of Gas Flow Management
 Be able to work according to an existing set of rules, standards and guidelines
Communication Skills
 Communicate with all members of the development team to, i.e.
o understand business drivers
o come to the best possible solution to meet the customer requirements
o discuss code during pair programming and code reviews
 Communicate with the technical lead to understand the constraints of the application
architecture that must be followed.
 Provide estimations for future development work during product backlog refinements
 Propose improvements, both
o technical improvements to our products
o process improvements within the dev team and across teams
 Master one of both national languages (French\/Dutch) and have at least a good
understanding of the other. Be fluent in English (both spoken and written).

body:
Beste collega’s,

Voor onze klant Telenet te Mechelen zijn we op zoek naar een Data Insights & Reporting Analyst. Telenet vraagt nadrukkelijk naar iemand die voldoende kennis\/ervaring met Qlik Sense kan voorleggen.
Er kan 3d per week remote gewerkt worden, de overige 2d zal je verwacht worden op het hoofdkantoor in Mechelen (maandag & woensdag).

Meer informatie:

As a leading telecommunications and entertainment company with more than 7 million customer interactions and around 100 internal Telenet and BASE stores in Belgium and more than 1500 employees working in a customer-oriented function, Telenet has a very diverse data availability across the entire organization (e.g. customer, product, interaction data).

Within the Customer Operations Steering Tribe (part of the larger Customer Operations Circle), we are looking for a Data Insights & Reporting Analyst to become a part of our Customer Operations Office Team, where we will use data to support, challenge and inspire our Telenet, BASE & back-office customer operations colleagues with clear recommendations, actionable insights, and efficient self-service dashboards.

Key Responsibilities

Key overall responsibility is to provide our Customer Operations Leadership with a sense of calm, clarity and predictability by actively seeking to understand the plans and ambitions of internal and external stakeholders that significantly impact our operations. Our second mission is to promote transparency and understanding of the Customer Operations throughout the organization by providing clear and accessible information that enables leadership stakeholders to comprehend the bigger pictures. Some tasks related to our mission are:


  *   Be a day-to-day SPOC person for the BASE Customer Operations BASE Tribe
  *   Take the lead in insights deepdives and cases around key operations topics prioritized in a monthly performance meeting with (senior) leadership.
  *   Ensure the execution of the deepdives are done in the most efficient way, and interpretable for business stakeholders
  *   Define the business data and KPI’s that are needed to produce the most meaningful insights
  *   Synthesize complex insights into easy-to-understand actionable recommendations that resonate with stakeholders
  *   Support in the budget process during the summer months in close collaboration with business and controlling
  *   Create structural Qlik sense reports to support decisioning and reach objectives


About You

  *   Master’s degree in a quantitative field (Business Engineering, Applied Economics, Computer Sciences, Information Management…) or equivalent by experience
  *   Looking for (non-starting) professionals and more experienced data experts with having Experience in Telecom, Entertainment, Consulting or similar industries is a plus
  *   Experience with at least 1 reporting tool and the use of Qlik Sense is mandatory
  *   Strong acumen in quantitative analytics and structured problem solving
  *   Results driven: able to coordinate an analytics initiative end to end from ideation through production and adoption and have an understanding of the life cycle of an analytics initiative and the common pitfalls.
  *   Excellent presentation and storytelling skills and ability to influence decision makers
  *   Fluent in English and preferably in Dutch\/French


Als je vragen hebt of een gepaste kandidaat ter beschikking hebt mag je me dat altijd laten weten.

Met vriendelijke groeten,

[cid:image001.png@01D98357.6699A900]
Wout Van Bavel
Account Manager
+32 499 75 45 57
LinkedIn<https:\/\/safelink.com\/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fwout-van-bavel%2F&data=05%7C01%##################%40email.com%7C0302940a46844ea367b608db515dc5e2%7C49c3d703357947bfa8887c913fbdced9%7C0%7C0%7C638193235525821730%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=1ZBU4i71Jp4yCakcDV%2F1GLyEQEYg4FjNrVZDQsAQUgM%3D&reserved=0>

body:
Collega’s,

Voor de Nationale Loterij zoeken we een Power BI Developer die voldoet aan volgende profielbeschrijving:

Beschrijving van de opdracht:

Het doel van deze opdracht betreft het tijdelijk aanwerven van een Power BI Developer voor de verdere migratie naar Power BI alsook de ontwikkeling van nieuwe modellen en rapporten in Power BI binnen het Data & Analytics team.

Volgende taken vallen onder de verantwoordelijkheid van de Power BI Developer:

  *   Design en development van Tabular modellen o.b.v. data uit het Data Platform.

  *   Performance optimalisatie van bestaande modellen.

  *   Toepassen en delen van best practices en Modelling Patterns.

  *   Support van business BI teams bij de ontwikkeling van Power BI oplossingen.

  *   Nauwe samenwerking met business teams om de functionele en technische requirements te vertalen en expertise te bieden waar nodig.

  *   Het verder uitwerken van een governance model en deze toepassen en aanbrengen bij de verschillende business BI teams.

  *   Schrijven van geoptimaliseerde DAX.

  *   Schrijven van technische –en gebruikersdocumentatie.

  *   Ondersteuning bieden bij vragen van eindgebruikers.

Profiel:
De voorgestelde kandidaat moet ten minste 4 jaar ervaring hebben in projecten binnen Power BI en moet volgende technologieën\/technieken beheersen:

  *   Power BI

  *   Tabular data modelling

  *   DAX

  *   T-SQL

  *   Dimensional Modeling

 Ervaring hebben in:

  *   Vertalen van complexe business vraagstukken naar concrete oplossingen binnen Power BI.

  *   Het raadplegen van gegevens in een Data Warehouse

  *   Algemene governance principes binnen een Power BI platform

  *   Ontwerpen van data marts volgens de Kimball methodologie.

  *   Bouwen van geoptimaliseerde OLAP cubes en het schrijven van DAX


Roles

  *   Medior   BI Engineer Most recent experience   This year
  *   Medior   BI expert Most recent experience   This year
  *   Medior   Business Intelligence Consultant Most recent experience   This year
  *   Medior   Consultant BI Most recent experience   This year


Skills

  *   DAX Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   This year
  *   Power BI Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   This year
  *   SQL Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   This year
  *   SQL Server Level   Beginner   Most recent experience   This year
  *   SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS) Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   This year

Languages

  *   Dutch or French Level   Native or bilingual proficiency
  *   English Level professional working proficiency

Location

  *   Main address: rue belliard, 25 - 1000 Bruxelles
  *   Remote option
Duurtijd: As soon as possible – 30\/06\/2023 (3 months – full time)
Richttarief: 790€\/dag (eindprijs)
Deadline voor indiening: 13\/04\/2023
Alvast hartelijk dank om de CV’s + kostprijs + beschikbaarheid van jullie potentiële kandidaten te bezorgen.

body:
Collega’s,

Voor D’Ieteren, vestiging Kortenberg zoeken we een BI Reporting Specialist die voldoet aan volgende profielbeschrijving:

Description
D'Ieteren Automotive is the official distributor of the Volkswagen, Audi, SEAT, Škoda, Bentley, Lamborghini, Bugatti and Porsche brands, as well as spare parts and accessories. D'Ieteren Automotive has approximately 1.2 million vehicles of the VW Group brands on the road, which represents a market share of almost 24%. D'Ieteren Automotive manages a strong network of independent dealerships throughout the country and directly operates dealerships on the Brussels-Malines-Antwerp axis.

To complete its offer, the company sells used vehicles (My Way and Audi Approved+) and provides maintenance, financing and leasing services through VDFin, a joint subsidiary with Volkswagen Financial Services. The company's mission is to create seamless and sustainable mobility for all.

Context :
For our After Sales Insights & Analytics department we're looking for a BI Data & Reporting Specialist at D’Ieteren Automotive
Together we cover the reporting, insights & analysis for the complete after sales business, consisting out of:

     *   The sales in Belgium of genuine parts and accessories for Volkswagen, Audi, Volkswagen Commercial Vehicles, SEAT, CUPRA, Skoda and Porsche brands.
     *   Dealer data: the complete view on our dealer network giving their best support and service to our end customers and their car.
     *   weCare contracts : the official extended warranty or service contracts we offer to our customers, in order to give them the opportunity to optimize the budget for the maintenance or repair costs.
     *   Warranty business: the 2-5 year legal or extended warranty, as the roadside assistance we offer to our customers

Duties\/Responsibilities:
As a  BI Reporting Specialist  you are responsible for

     *   Documenting the current existing reports and the update processes behind it
     *   Documenting the current business processes and data used that are behind the reports enabling this documentation to be used for onboarding a new team member
     *   Updating on a timely matter the reports that were listed based upon this process that was described
     *   Complete the necessary data checks of this reporting
     *   Optimizing where possible the current reporting and processes

Possible other assignments:

     *   You collect our stakeholders business requirements and translate them into reports, analysis and\/or insights
     *   You provide intuitive reports based on advanced analysis, using state of the art visualization to support data-based business decisions
     *   You ensure coherent KPIs across all businesses
     *   You take part in projects as a sales BI expert
     *   You know your data: you can identify and select the best KPI’s to suit the business request
     *   You are not afraid to challenge the business on the relevancy of the request

You will work closely with our IT-Data department:

     *   You formulate requirements so IT can build or enrich our datasets, or you can do the enrichment yourself
     *   You coordinate to ensure the proper implementation of our data requirements
     *   You validate developments with the business requestor

Required skills\/Abilities:

     *   Good at creation of technical and business documentations (definitions, measures descriptions, ...)
     *   Experienced in documenting the created workflows and dashboards
     *   Advanced Knowledge of Power BI : Desktop, DAX language (creation of measures), Power BI Premium extended features (not required but an advantage)
     *   Good understanding of databases, experience with SQL
     *   Expert in data visualization (UX) to create user-friendly dashboards, by using the original Power BI tools
     *   Meticulous in data validation
     *   Experienced in project management in BI projects (implementation of new data sources, defining of KPI’s, alignment of the definitions of the KPI)
     *   Language : Fluent in Dutch and\/or French, English common use mainly in the reports
     *   You can work autonomously on dedicated tasks but you also pay attention to their dependencies while working with your teammates on collaborative assignments with deadlines
     *   You are proactive and take ownership of the assigned business area by monitoring the use and performance of the BI solutions, optimize or correct it when necessary.

Education and experience:

     *   You have 4 to 6 years' experience in Data Analysis and Data Reporting

Locatie:

     *   Kortenberg (3 days onsite, presence on Friday expected)
     *   2 days homeworking

Timing:

     *   Start date: ASAP
     *   Mission of 1-2 months + potential extension

Interview process:

     *   First round with the Manager and the Technical Data Analyst (Onsite presence expected, if not possible, via Teams)
     *   Final round with the Director (Onsite presence expected, if not possible, via Teams)

Our values :

     *   PERSEVERANCE: We value showing grit in the face of obstacles
     *   HONOURABLE: We value being true to our word
     *   CURIOUS BOLDNESS: We value continuous learning and acting with daring intent
     *   SUPPORTIVE: We really care about each other’s success
     *   ENTHUSIASM: We value expressing emotions as part of our true selves

Skills:

  *   DAX: Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   This year
  *   Excel: Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   This year
  *   Paginated reports: Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   1 to 3 years ago
  *   Power BI: Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   This year
  *   Power BI Premium: Level   Nice to have   Most recent experience   Any time
  *   Power Query: Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   This year
  *   SQL: Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   1 to 3 years ago

Roles:

     *   Medior Reporting\/Data Analyst Most recent experience   This year


Talen:

  *   Dutch or French: Native or bilingual proficiency
  *   English: Professional working proficiency

Location:

  *   Main address:  Leuvensesteenweg, 639 - 3071 Kortenberg
  *   Partially remote

Duurtijd: As soon as possible - 01\/05\/2023 (2 months - full time)
Richttarief: 500€ - 690€\/dag (eindprijs)

Deadline voor indiening: 23\/03\/2023

Alvast hartelijk dank om de CV’s + kostprijs + beschikbaarheid van jullie potentiële kandidaten te bezorgen.

met vriendelijke groet,


Angelo Jacobs

body:
Collega’s,

Voor onze klant Telenet te Mechelen zoek ik 2 analisten die beantwoorden aan onderstaande omschrijving.

Duur: minimum 1 jaar
Remote: 60%
Start: februari\/maart 2023

We are looking for Business\/Functional Data Analyst within the BI\/Big Data area.

Key Responsibilities:
Key overall responsibility is to provide business with data solutions to help them solve their business questions\/support their business. This typically includes the following activities:

  *   Identify data needs for new applications and products to serve business leaders by designing the optimal data set-up considering business and data requirements by forming a bridge between the business and data engineers
  *   Create and test data assets for new applications and products to make these assets future-proof, efficient and interpretable
  *   Present towards business and data colleagues to ensure correct interpretation and increase data usage across the entire company
  *   Be the key contact person and owner for all specific data assets and data flows for a specific domain to ensure the data from you domain is leveraged in a correct way

About You:

  *   Master’s degree in a quantitative field (Business Engineering, Applied Economics, Computer Sciences, Information Management…) or equivalent by experience
  *   Good knowledge of SQL, MS Excel, Qlik Sense or similar tools
  *   Strong acumen in quantitative analytics and structured problem solving
  *   Excellent presentation and storytelling skills and ability to influence decision makers
  *   Domain knowledge and experience in a business function in Telecom, Entertainment or similar industries is a plus
  *   Entrepreneurial and flexible mindset: enthusiastic to work in a very dynamic & changing environment, committed and business savvy to navigate the potential technical or organizational roadblocks
  *   Results driven: able to manage an analytics initiative end to end from ideation through production and adoption and have an understanding of the life cycle of an analytics initiative and the common pitfalls.
  *   Knowledge of the Belgian Market
  *   Fluent in English and Dutch\/French

Gr


Guy Van de Vel
Account Manager

body:
Beste,

Voor een klant nog een data engineer\/analyst :

De specifieke rol van de Data Analyst and Engineer hierin is tweeledig:
Data preparation :
• Te analyseren welke informatienoden er zijn voor een specifieke rapporteringscontext en op welke manier aan deze noden kan voldaan worden binnen de bestaande data omgeving
• De traduire les Business Requirements dans un ETL pipeline de manière autonome et veille à la performance des codes qui sont écrits. Dans le processus de développement, il \/ elle crée de la documentation et assure la standardisation du code.
• Identifier, de manière pro-active, des points d’amélioration dans l’architecture et les ETL (stabilité, performance,…)
• Assurer la suivi des ETL existants et, si nécessaire, intervenir en cas de problème.

Data visualization :
• Être capable de développer des visualisations (complexes) de manière autonome dans QlikSense
• Pro-activement venir avec des proposition de visualisation ou challenger les visualisations existantes

Profiel :
• Ervaring met de functionele en technische aspecten van data visualisatie (development, storytelling,…) binnen een context van analytics en information management (business intelligence, reporting en data warehousing).
• Knowledge in QlikSense (or QlikView) or advanced experience in any other BI technology
• Fluent in SQL (Oracle is a plus), big data environments are considered as a plus (Hadoop, Hive,…)
• Strong capabilities in SAS programming
• Sterk analytisch vermogen en zin voor synthese, vaardigheid om complexe situaties te structureren
• Kennis en ervaring in het domein van functioneel en dimensioneel data modelleren (Kimball), bij gebruik van gestructureerde en semigestructureerde data omgevingen • Fluent in MS Excel
• Experience in Risk and Finance is considered as a plus
• Contactvaardig, in staat om als ‘brugfunctie’ te functioneren tussen business mensen die een functionele taal spreken en technische profielen die in technische termen communiceren
• Zelfstandig, georganiseerd en flexibel kunnen werken binnen een dynamische omgeving
• Samenwerkingsgericht en zin voor initiatief
• Resultaatgericht
• Speaking and\/or understanding FR and NL, understanding ENG

Asap starten, lange duur

Mvg,

Description



Mission context


Data Analyst


* Business and data-analyst within the Market & Customer Analysis team
* Plays a role in close collaboration with other team members and internal stakeholders in translating business needs into hypotheses which can be verified by using client data being available at BNPPF
* Having a good knowledge of the business context combined with a strong analytical mind
* Being critical (i.e. being able to translate the research needs into relevant hypotheses, covering relevant data variables, being able to focus on what's key in the outcome of the analysis)
* Being able to grasp the relevant data (knowing which data is required, which variables, format, data sources,...) and to transform and analyze it in order to support business in their existing needs or client-data related questions

preferable
