body:
Beste collega’s,

Voor een overheidsklant regio Brussel zijn we op zoek naar een Azure Data Engineer. Een belangrijke vereiste is dat de kandidaat vlot Franstalig moet zijn! Nederlands wordt gezien als mooie plus.

Gewenste startdatum: 01\/03\/2024
Geschatte einddatum: 31\/12\/2024
Regime: Voltijds
Remote policy: 2d op kantoor (Brussel), 3d rempote
Senioriteit: 5-10 jaar
Talenkennis: FR & ENG verplicht! NL een mooie plus

Beschrijving
Wij zijn op zoek naar een Data Engineer met een passie voor data, cloudtechnologieën en innovatieve oplossingen. Je komt terecht in een dynamisch en agile team, verantwoordelijk voor het ontwerpen, ontwikkelen en onderhouden van data pipelines, data architecturen en analytische modellen op het Azure platform.

Taken

  *   Oplossingen voor het verzamelen, opslaan, transformeren en leveren van gegevens definiëren en implementeren op het Azureplatform, met behulp van services zoals Azure Data Factory,
  *   Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Data Lake, Azure Blob Storage, enz.
  *   Ontwikkel en optimaliseer SQL-query's, Python-scripts, Sparknotebooks en ETL\/ELT om de gegevenskwaliteit, betrouwbaarheid en prestaties te garanderen
  *   Ontwerp, ontwikkel en implementeer BI-oplossingen met behulp van SQL Server Integration Services en SQL Server Analysis Services.
  *   In samenwerking met de data architect een datamodel (relationeel, sterschema en datakluis) kunnen ontwerpen.
  *   Werk samen met data-analisten en zakelijke gebruikers om hun behoeften, gebruiksscenario's en technische specificaties te begrijpen
  *   Neem deel aan het ontwerp en de documentatie van dataarchitecturen, datamodellen en datastromen
  *   Zorg ervoor dat de best practices, beveiliging en vertrouwelijkheidsnormen voor gegevens worden nageleefd
  *   Zorgen voor het onderhoud, de monitoring en het oplossen van problemen met dataoplossingen

Skills

  *   Vereist:
     *   Azure Data components (Data Factory, Synapse Analytic,
     *   Analysis Services)
     *   Microsoft BI suite (SSIS, SSAS, SQL Server)
     *   Databricks
     *   Data modeling (Star Schema, Data Vault)
     *   Structured Query Language (T-SQL)
     *   Python and Shell scripting
  *   Gewenst:
     *   Delta Lake
     *   Power BI
     *   SSRS

Als je een geschikte kandidaat ter beschikking hebt twijfel dan niet om me te contacteren.

Met vriendelijke groeten,
Wout Van Bavel

body:
Beste collega’s,

Voor een overheidsklant regio Brussel (Anderlecht) zijn we op zoek naar een Senior Data Engineer.

Gewenste startdatum:01\/02\/2024
Voorlopige einddatum: 31\/12\/2024
Regime: Voltijds
Locatie: Brussel
Talen: NL of FR + ENG
Remote\/onsite: 2d onsite, 3d remote

Beschrijving
We want to become data-driven. We strive to make data a shared asset giving all stakeholders a common view of the company. We provide users with the tools they need to analyse and explore data and generate insights that improve customer satisfaction and operational efficiency. As Data Engineer within our Data & Analytics team, you play an instrumental role in the realization of this vision by building our data platform.

Verantwoordelijkheden
You contribute to the design and implementation of the Azure data platform.
You develop and deploy end-to-end data applications leveraging the Azure data platform.
You have experience with Azure data analytics services (Data Factory, ADLS, Synapse, SQL Server, Databricks, ML).
You are familiar with data technologies (spark, python\/pandas, SQL).
You have knowledge of state-of-the-art software engineering best practices and tools (Git, CI\/CD, tests, Pipelines, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Azure DevOps).
You are familiar with Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform).
You work with Data Architects and Platform Architects to ensure your work is aligned with the requirements and architecture.
You work with the Security & Infrastructure teams to ensure data assets and data products are integrated and secured.
You work independently, prioritize multiple stakeholders and tasks, and manage work time effectively.
You participate to the definition of standards, guidelines and best practices and make sure to respect them.
You remain up to date with latest trends and technologies and identify potential impact of market trends in your tasks.

Als je een geschikte kandidaat ter beschikking hebt of meer info wenst twijfel dan niet om me te contacteren.

Met vriendelijke groeten,
Wout Van Bavel

body:
Collega’s,

Voor Nike ELC zoeken we een Data Engineer die voldoet aan onderstaande profielbeschrijving:

RESPONSIBILITIES
Ø  Develop Data Pipelines using Databricks and or Spyspark libraries.
Ø  Design and implement unit\/component\/integration tests
Ø  Collaborate with other engineers on creating common code bas using Github SCM
Ø  Take care of the non-functional requirement like Security, Compliance, performance and maintenance.
Ø  Learn new technologies\/tools and be able to support that in quick span of time.
Ø  Experience in Data Analytic work would be a plus
REQUIRED
Ø  Bachelor's degree in statistics, business, economics, mathematics, computer science, engineering, research, or a related field.
Ø  5+ years of industry experience, 3+ years of relevant big data experience
Ø  Demonstrated experience and ability to deliver results on multiple projects in a fast-paced, agile environment
Ø  Strong programming experience in Python, good knowledge of PySpark
Ø  Experience working with Hadoop and Big Data processing frameworks (Spark, Hive, Nifi, Spark-Streaming, Flink, etc.)

  *   Knowledge of SCM Tools – Github, Bitbucket
  *   Experience working with NoSQL data stores such as HBase, DynamoDB, etc.

  *   Experience with SQL and SQL Analytical functions
  *   Experience building domain-driven Microservices
  *   Experience working with structured and unstructured datasets, including CSV, TXT, JSON, and XML
  *   Experience provisioning RESTful API’s to enable real-time data consumption

  *   Ability to collaborate with key partners to understand, identify, and capture requirements

  *   Ability to work in cross-functional teams following Agile Methodologies (SAFe, SCRUM)
  *   A flexible, dynamic personality who works well partnering\/collaborating in a matrixed team environment
  *   Ability to work independently requiring minimal direction, execute large projects following established guidelines\/procedures and take the initiative to explore and solve problems
  *   Desire to work collaboratively with your teammates to come up with the best solution to a problem
  *   Strong desire to learn and share knowledge with others

Ik zie graag jullie geschikte kandidaten, zijn\/haar CV, beschikbaarheid en kostprijs tegemoet.

body:
Collega’s,

Voor IBA, vestiging Louvain-la-Neuve zoeken we een Medior Data Engineer die voldoet aan volgende profielbeschrijving:

JOB DETAILS
Mission
Who are we?
The Belgian, B-Corp certified company IBA has opened new ways to diagnose and fight cancer and is the global leader in the field of Proton Therapy, the most advanced technologies treatment against cancer.

Job Description

The Advanced Analytics team at IBA focuses on using data to add value to the lives of our customers and colleagues. We value agility, ownership, and we are not afraid to challenge the status quo.

Your mission is to contribute to our centralized data warehouse and data lake and help our business teams with extracting insights from data. You'll use your experience to work closely with other data engineers and our data architect to ensure that your setup is maintainable, scalable and in line with increasing business needs.
What we value
Must-have:
•    At least 4 years of relevant experience
•    Hands-on experience with software and architectural design
•    Proficient in Python and SQL (DBT)
•    Relevant cloud experience (Azure preferred)
•    Experience with delta lake, database assets
•    Experience with data modelling techniques
•    Experience with container orchestration technologies (Kubernetes, Docker, ...)
•    Experience with CI\/CD pipelines
•    Experience with Databricks
•    Platform-oriented mindset
•    Fluent in English, French is a plus
•    Passionate about data

Nice to have:
•    Experience with Power BI
•    Experience with IoT solutions or data streaming
•    Experience with MLOps

Life at IBA
Diversity is fundamental to our culture. We value the uniqueness of individuals and the different perspectives and talents they bring to IBA. We learn from and respect the cultures in which we work, promote diversity within our workforce, and have an inclusive environment that helps each and every one of us to fully contribute to IBA’s success.

The identity of IBA is characterized by a group of colleagues driven by motivation, curiosity, creativity, the desire to learn on a daily basis, by technical challenges and above all by a highly developed team and family spirit that makes the daily life smoother and more enjoyable!

By joining a team of about 40 nationalities and working on more than 45 different sites on 3 continents, IBA offers you the opportunity of a meaningful career with a direct impact in the fight against cancer.

We are driven by:

  *   Innovating in a cutting-edge technology environment

  *   Developing professional and personal skills by learning on the Job; by participating in challenging projects; top class courses

  *   Evolving in a friendly culture environment based upon solid values (dare - share - care - be fair)

  *   Acting autonomously and belonging to motivated teams with good work-life balance

  *   Contributing to a company where sustainability, safety and well-being are key to our success

 Roles:

     *   Medior Data Engineer Most recent experience   This year

Skills:

  *   CI\/CD pipelines Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   Any time
  *   Cloud experience (Azure preferred) Level   Advanced   Most recent experience   Any time
  *   Container orchestration technologies (Kubernetes, Docker, ...) Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   Any time
  *   Data modelling techniques Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   Any time
  *   Databricks Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   Any time
  *   Delta lake, Database assets Level   Intermediate   Most recent experience   Any time
  *   Hands-on experience with software and architectural design Level   Advanced   Most recent experience   Any time
  *   Python Level   Advanced   Most recent experience   Any time
  *   SQL Level   Advanced   Most recent experience   Any time

Talen:

  *   English Level   Native or bilingual proficiency
  *   French Level   Limited working proficiency

Location:

  *   Main address: chemin du cyclotron, 3 - 1348 Louvain-la-Neuve
  *   Partially remote


Duurtijd: 08\/01\/2024 - 30\/06\/2024 - 6 months (full time)
Richttarief: 725€ dag (eindprijs)

Deadline voor indiening: 03\/01\/2024

Alvast hartelijk dank om de CV’s + kostprijs + beschikbaarheid van jullie potentiële kandidaten te bezorgen.

met vriendelijke groet,

Angelo Jacobs
Business Development Manager

body:
Dear,

Role category -
Role profile
 S5 - Data
 Data Engineer - Senior
Job title
 Data Engineer
Work location
 BRU.-MONTAGNE DU PARC\/WARANDEBERG
 MONTAGNE DU PARC 3
 1000 BRUXELLES
Start date
 01\/12\/2023
End date
 29\/11\/2024
Description

Mission context

Data Engineer

The Data Hub tribe is one of the key components of the Data department, to help developing and rolling out the bank-wide BI and Data strategy at BNP Paribas Fortis.  Its mission is to service all metiers and functions of the bank with transversal BI solutions (front and backend developments) & tools. In doing so, the Data Hub team will contribute  to the spreading of the new data governance and “Know your data” culture throughout BNPP Fortis.
Function  description


- As a data engineer \/ data modeller you establish, improve  and deploy modelling standard&guidelines for the whole Datehub tribe by coaching and assisting the data engineers in the usage of these S&G.


?- As a data engineer \/ data modeller  you will assess on a regular basis the datamodels on the correct application of the rules\/guidelines\/standards by the data engineers.  This involves a close collaboration with the data architects and data managers and a detailed knowledge of  the BNP Paribas Fortis standards.


?- As a data engineer \/ data modeller you will create awareness on data modelling by promoting techniques that make sense via chapter meetings or by giving trainings to functional and technical data engineers


?- As a data engineer \/  data modeller  you will act as a DBA in the NON-PROD environment by supporting the technical data engineers in the preparation , in the validation and in the execution of the ORACLE scripts. Also support the data engineers in optimizing performance on existing databases.


?- As a data engineer \/  data modeller you follow  and develop yourself in the recent  IT-and DATA evolutions (internal and external) and propose innovative data solutions that can help  improve business activities.



With the squad, the data engineer works on solution description and implementation of different projects and enhancements within the big data hub-environment .  Main technologies used on the data hub platform are Scala, Java, Kafka, Flink, Hadoop, Spark, Hive, ... Having experience in building applicative framework and generic components on the datahub is a must have.

This mission will focus on what we call the run the  bank activities where the focus will be monitoring the operational environments, keep them in a good shape, identify tracks of continuous improvement.  Also the deployments on the dathub  in a the NON-PROD and PROD environment is an important activity in this mission. Accuracy in the preparation and the execution of the deployments as well as good communication are crucial for this mission.
 Language requirements
Dutch


  *   Preferable , but not mandatory
French


  *   Preferable , but not mandatory
English


  *   Sound knowledge
Education


  *   Bachelor\/Master ‘s degree in IT or engineering or equivalent by professional experience
Certification

Travel

Agile requirements
An analyst involved in Agile projects must have the "Agile mindset" which implies:

  *   a positive attitude and pragmatism
  *   thirst for knowledge: Agile is about learning and adapting. Knowledge sharing is key to success.
  *   The goal of team success: Agile is about the success of the team, no individual success or heroic behavior. It is more important for the team to succeed than for the individual to have completed his\/her tasks.
  *   There is no failure, only feedback: Agile is about taking everything as lessons, adjusting actions based on the feedback, resulting in continuous improvement.


Beyond the roles:  Agile teams are cross-functional.  All required disciplines are represented in the team (analysis, development, testing, … ). However, although team members have a primary role representing a discipline, they are expected to take on other roles and contribute to other disciplines  whenever it helps towards reaching the sprint goal.
Required experience \/ knowledge
At least 5 years of relevant experience
Technical experience
mandatory


  *

?You have at least 5 years of experience with data in any of the financial domain (product related, business related).  Having a significant experience in Big Data technologies and platforms is an advantage.


  *

?You have practical experience with Datavault modelling.  You are familiar with Powerdesigner or any other modelling tool.

preferable


  *   Knowing and experienced DEVOPS-practices.
Business experience
mandatory
Experience with working in a complex organization
preferable
Specific requirement for agile: practical experience with Scrum
Soft skills

·       Good analytical and problem solving skills.
·       Quick self-starter, pro-active attitude
·       Team player  always ready to share, train or provide support to others.
·       Autonomy, commitment and perseverance
·       Flexible, accurate & control minded.
·       Ability to work in a dynamic and multi-cultural environment
·       Ability to deliver results respecting deadlines
·       Good oral and written communication. Ability to turn advanced technical topics and industry jargon into easy-to-understand information .
·       Quality driven and cost avoidance minded
·       Able to handle changing priorities
·       Customer focus
·       Passionate about data



  Please submit your candidate in the attached template!

Tx!


[CRONOS-logo]

Kind regards,
Kristin Heymans
Business development & Account Management
0032 472 475 606

body:
Beste,

Voor onze klant bpost in Brussel zoeken wij een Enterprise Data Architect.
Dit is voor een vervanging van de huidige consultant.

De job bestaat uit 3 delen :

  *   Opzetten van Strategische Data Governance (30%)

Bestaande systemen op orde zetten en optimaliseren (60%)

  *   Coaching van een interne Enterprise Data Architect (10%

We zoeken iemand met een technische data achtergrond in AWS en\/of Azure (minstens 1 met diepgaande kennis), die zelfsturend en zelfstandig kan werken in een startup omgeving.

Beschikbaarheid zo snel mogelijk.

De klant omschrijft het als volgt :

As an Enterprise Data Architect, your primary responsibilities will be to assist in establishing Data Governance practices, analyze data platforms on AWS and Azure from an architectural perspective, and propose new architecture solutions.
Additionally, you will be expected to possess coaching abilities to mentor and guide our new data architect.
You will report to the Chief Enterprise Architect which manages the architecture team currently consisting of 5 Enterprise Architects and 4 solution Architects.

As an Enterprise Data Architect, you will be responsible for:

  *   Coach and support architects in training by sharing your experience, best practices and offering them guidance and advice.
  *   Setting up data governance practice: Responsibilities include establishing policies, processes, and frameworks to ensure effective management and utilization of data assets based on industry standards and best practices.
  *   collaborating with stakeholders:  to define data standards, promoting data privacy and compliance, and implementing governance mechanisms.
  *   Data Migration Roadmap: Provide expert guidance and advisory support as a Data Architect in the development of a comprehensive roadmap for the migration of the organization's data platform and reporting systems.
  *   Take part in the existing governance practices within the architecture Way of Working (e.g. PI planning, Quarterly business review, Architecture Center of Excellence, daily standups, peer reviews, …)
  *   Act as a steward for the new data platform: providing ongoing guidance and support to ensure the proper implementation of governance principles and best practices. Monitor and assess compliance with governance policies and provide recommendations for continuous improvement.

Your profile:
The ideal candidate for an Enterprise Architect position should have:


  *   Degree in Engineering, Informatics, Computer Science, or equivalent professional experience.
  *   Professional working proficiency in English and either French or Dutch.
  *   Minimum of 5 years of experience as an Enterprise Architect or in a similar role.
  *   Proven experience as an Enterprise Data Architect, including expertise in establishing Data Governance practices.
  *   Strong technical proficiency in analyzing and evaluating data platforms on AWS and Azure.
  *   Familiarity with modern data integration techniques, data warehousing, and data modeling.
  *   Up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in data architecture.
  *   Excellent coaching and mentoring abilities to support the growth and development of team members.
  *   Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to engage effectively with various stakeholders.
  *   Strong interest in both business and IT topics, acting as a bridge between the two domains.
  *   Certification in relevant technologies and frameworks (e.g., AWS, Azure, TOGAF) is a plus.
  *   Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience in an international project and program environment.

Assignment for 3 months with possible extension up to 6 months and +

Graag ontvangen wij jullie jullie feedback met Cv, beschikbaarheid en kostprijs naar mijzelf en Diederik Wyffels (cc).

Mvg,

Mireille De Keuleneir
Key Account Manager

body:
Dear P&C,

Norwegian Airlines has an urgent request:


They are looking for a skilled data architect (immediately) who has the perspective of data engineering and analytics in mind to help Norwegian build a best practice architecture for a data driven base on their currently implemented platform.



  *   They are currently moving from on prem to cloud with a full AWS strategy.
  *   They are already using various SaaS apps and cloud-based services (no time during the meeting to get into details)
  *   First move solutions that are made for the cloud. Meaning, they are deliberately avoiding any lift and shift.
  *   Analytics platform is in place - one of the first systems - building the rest around and on it
  *   Moving some focus towards business critical services which will be transferred to AWS.
  *   Data used for making the company more efficient - weight, balance, fuel
  *   Assessment first what is there, what is needed to reach a well architected base - essential starting point

Please send me CV's, availability and day rate asap.

Thank you.



 Kind regards \/ Med vänlig hälsning,



Esma El Harti

Co-founder \/ Managing Director

body:
Beste collega’s,

Voor onze klant Telenet te Mechelen zijn we op zoek naar een Cloud Data Engineer. Volgende week dinsdag bespreken we de details van deze rol met Telenet, maar hier alvast wat meer info:

At Telenet, data & analytics are recognized as the “fuel and engine under the hood” that can improve every aspect of our business and make us more and more “customer intimate”.
As a data driven company, we have one data organization with one plan and one voice to deal with data holistically and strategically. Our data & analytics experts are constantly striving for value creation for and with our business and our customers. They do this by building high-quality data assets, innovative AI products, strong insight cases and in-market experiments into the fabric of the business teams.
In order to enable all this valuable work, there is a Data Platform & Architecture team within the tribe as well consisting out of data architects and cloud data engineers with a mission to build and maintain state of the art data services towards the company. Now for the best part, we want you to become part of it as senior cloud data engineer!

Make a difference and…

  *   Work on projects related to Big Data, Data Warehousing, ML Ops, AI engineering et cetera.
  *   Build products\/services in AWS from secure storage to processing power, purpose-based access management and general accelerators that can bring efficiency and effectiveness towards the tribe.
  *   Abstract underlying infrastructure to enable your customer to focus on the data processing and allowing the platform team to rapidly follow new technologies without having to trigger a migration project.
  *   Take a leading role in technology innovations and support the landing of them, together with the architects, in the various value teams.

Got this?

  *   A Master or bachelor’s in computer science or related education \/ experience.
  *   Profound experience in a production-level data environments.
  *   Excellent knowledge on AWS, Terraform and Python.
  *   Good knowledge of EMR, EKS, Spark, Gitlab and Snowflake.
  *   Experience with modern schedulers: Airflow, Prefect, …
  *   Experience with scalable API development in a challenging production environment.
  *   Experience in a DevOps world is a plus, the will to take end-to-end ownership is a must.
  *   Good communication skills. You feel comfortable challenging others.
  *   Profound English skills. Dutch skills are a plus.
  *   The ability to get things done.
  *   Data privacy and ethics on your mind

Als je een geschikte kandidaat hebt of dinsdag meer informatie wenst twijfel dan niet om me te contacteren.

Met vriendelijke groeten,

[cid:image001.png@01DA1948.E7A30050]
Wout Van Bavel
Account Manager
+32 499 75 45 57
LinkedIn<https:\/\/safelink.com\/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fwout-van-bavel%2F&data=05%7C01%##################%40email.com%7C717c73f1fb9f4ab051f008dbe757ea51%7C49c3d703357947bfa8887c913fbdced9%7C0%7C0%7C638358137139466923%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Payr0Axqtp%2FG04kIj0ubJkrBIiuJy18j0FBC7xezlFE%3D&reserved=0>

body:
Collega’s,

Ter vervanging van één van onze consultants, zoeken wij naar een ervaren cloud data engineer.

Start: november 2023

At Telenet, data & analytics are recognized as the “fuel and engine under the hood” that can improve every aspect of our business and make us more and more “customer intimate”.

As a data driven company, we have one data organization with one plan and one voice to deal with data holistically and strategically. Our data & analytics experts are constantly striving for value creation for and with our business and our customers. They do this by building innovative data pipelines, delivering insights use cases, integrate analytics and in-market experiments into the fabric of the business teams.


  *   Become part of a squad that manages the Data Platform as a product.
contribute to the data product roadmap, which we prioritize as a team on a quarterly basis to fuel the overall company roadmap and initiatives with analytics
fit our data products with the overall data architecture, governance, standards, and guidelines

  *   design, build and test our data products
  *   meet the functional & non-functional requirements,
  *   meet the high standards for data ingestion, processing & storage
…and applying the right level of trust (quality, privacy, security) for their purpose
communicate on a regular basis to our stakeholders to increase data product awareness & usage

  *   Take a pivotal role in the development of new data platform capabilities. Optimize the delivery and operations of data solutions. Identify and roll-out solutions that enable our data scientists, engineers, and analysts to sustainably derive more value out of our data faster – in the form of new platform components, frameworks, and onboarding of cloud services for large-scale, robust, and real-time data ingestion, processing, modeling & analytics.
  *   Explore how cloud-based systems and pipelines can be used optimally to enhance the existing Big Data Platform.
  *   Democratize access to (large-scale) information assets for business users.
  *   Work in a young and dynamic team of data architects and engineers, operating in a self-organizing agile at company scale context.

You have proven experience in:

  *   existing and upcoming Data technologies (Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, SQL, Flink, Cassandra, ELK, ...) and like to stay in touch with new evolutions.
  *   Designing and building cloud-based data solutions and more specifically with AWS (IAM, S3, Glue, EMR, EKS, Sagemaker, …)
     *   Knowledge or experience of the following technologies is a plus. If you don’t master these yet, don’t worry! We can provide tailored inhouse training and coaching when required:
     *   System administration with Unix\/Linux and knowledge of Docker or Kubernetes and containerization
  *   Knowledge of proven software development best practices (coding standards, CI\/CD, infrastructure as code)
  *   You are eager to learn and like variation in your job working on different scopes
  *   You have a knack for spotting optimization potential and know how to realize it with robust engineering
  *   You possess good communication skills. You feel comfortable challenging others
  *   The ability to get things done and take end-to-end ownership
  *   You are pragmatic in your approach. You use the right techniques to provide the needed quality and detail while avoiding complex solutions.
  *   Good English skills. Dutch is a plus.

Mvg


Guy Van de Vel
Account Manager

CRONOS NV
Veldkant 33A
2550 KONTICH

M  + 32 477 872 447

Graag cv, ic en beschikbaarheden van eigen medewerkes of direcete freelancers.
Regime : FTE met 50% on site.
Bedankt.

We are looking for an Data architect Azure, with a good overall understanding of available services in the Azure Analytics stack.
This person is required to take the lead as Data Architect for GTO Manufacturing & Powertrain projects.
We need this person to keep everything together but also to have practical experience to dive in and setup different environments & services.
Leadership capabilities needed as this person is supposed to take the technical lead role and discussion with Business Stakeholders.

Working alongside with multiple product teams, you provide architecture leadership and support within the end-to-end lifecycle of managing data.
• You provide technical leadership, you participate in development efforts, and you represent the full internal and external capabilities of the platform.
• You will be an active member of the architects guild to oversee data management process and provide guidance and direction to development teams - including design, documentation, maintenance, enhancements and validation.
• You have a proven experience in one of following development track: Analytics & BI development, data analysis, data engineering, platforms administration.
• As architect, you have experiences on Azure Cloud platform around data (Databricks, ADLS storage, SQL DB...), and you know technologies like Python or Spark. Experience with Angular, ADF, Power BI is an advantage.
• You have experiences in defining and owning end-to-end scalable Data Architecture taking into account enterprise architecture and industry standards.
• You have participated in the development of architectures, strategies, and policies around data, including data governance, master data management, metadata management, data quality and data security.
• You are used to develop, document and maintain logical and physical data models.
• You are used to work closely with multiple internal teams including compliance, privacy, risk, information security, support and operations to ensure all business requirements are considered in the design process

Competences & Skills Mandatory:
• Data Architecture has been your world for minimum 4 years 
• Writing SQL and doing data modelling are natural to you
• Data Architecture design
• Azure components like ADFv2, Databricks, Synapse, Delta lake
• Azure Advanced Analytics technologies and frameworks
• Advanced Analytics related programming language: Python, Pyspark
• Microsoft cloud based delivery model
• Data Management, Data Governance and Data Quality
• API or microservice deployment
• Data Integration and Processing real time\/streaming data
• DevSecOps
•appreciation of the purpose and the practices of Agile
• You have experience working in a global environment
• You have demonstrated a growth and learning mindset.
• You have excellent communication skills in French and English (C1 level)

Philip Veen
Business Development Manager
Mobile :  +32 (0)475 79 04 73
Fax : +32 (0)3 451 23 92
Phone : +32 (0)3 451 23 91
Address : Veldkant 33a – 2550 Kontich – Belgium

Dear,

Role category -
Role profile
 S1 - IT Functional
 Architect - Expert
Job title
 Data and BI Architect
Work location
 BRU.-MONTAGNE DU PARC\/WARANDEBERG
 MONTAGNE DU PARC 3
 1000 BRUXELLES
Start date
 01\/09\/2023
End date
 31\/08\/2024
Description

Data and BI Architect
Mission context
IT Architect mission in the context of our Data Tribe. This tribe covers: business intelligence for the whole bank, data governance, advanced analytics and artificial intelligence, data lake building \/ feeding, adoption of enterprise data modelling.
Function  description
Key activities

  *   Solution architecture : deliver the architecture documents for the projects in scope, with the support of the Data Lead Architecture, infrastructure architects and security architects.
Ensure the validation of the proposed solution.
  *   Management support and advice : provide support and neutral, proactive advice to the evolution of our data vision
  *   Enterprise architecture : advocate the data vision of the bank, improved it based on feedback, ensure other solution architects take the data dimension into account
  *   Define, document and maintain the reference architecture, always keeping “simplification” in mind
  *   Stay in touch with technology evolutions, incorporating them in the company architecture where appropriate

Deliverables

  *   Project architecture, asset architecture, reference architecture
  *   Recommendations to management
  *   Application diagrams, system maps, service interfaces, technical interfaces
  *   Architectural studies, architectural principles

Scope

  *   Data Tribe, with several teams : BI, data hub \/ data lake, advanced analytics and AI, data governance
  *   Data Architecture : increase the maturity of the architecture process when it comes to gathering data requirements and ensuring they are properly accounted for in the projects' solution architecture.
Agile requirements
Expected familiarity with Agile way of working
Language requirements
Dutch
Fluency at least in one of FR, NL, EN
French
Fluency at least in one of FR, NL, EN
English
Must have a good working knowledge in any case. Fluency required if both French and Dutch are not at good professional level
Required experience \/ knowledge


  *   At least 10 years of IT and Data experience
  *   At least 5 years in architecture, including the management of a small team of solution architects
Technical experience
mandatory


  *   IT Architecture
  *   Data warehousing
  *   Clouds (as AWS, Azure)
  *   Data lakes
  *   Microservice architecture
  *   Event driven architecture (e.g. Kafka)
Business experience
mandatory


  *   Knowledge of project management.
  *   Agile development
Soft skills


  *   At BNPPF, architects are not controller, they actually deliver the solutions required by projects. As a result, it is essential to be
     *   Neutral, objective expert, delivering in time
     *   Team player \/ team builder
     *   Communicative, networking, negotiator
     *   Analytical, accurate
     *   Creative, innovative, visionary
     *   Resilient





Please submit your candidate in the attached template!

 Tx!

body:
Beste,

Voor een klant in Brussel zoeken wij een Enterprise Data Architect.

As an Enterprise Data Architect, your primary responsibilities will be to assist in establishing Data Governance practices, analyze data platforms on AWS and Azure from an architectural perspective, and propose new architecture solutions.
Additionally, you will be expected to possess coaching abilities to mentor and guide our new data architect.

You will report to the Chief Enterprise Architect which manages the architecture team currently consisting of 5 Enterprise Architects and 4 solution Architects.

As an Enterprise Data Architect, you will be responsible for:

  *   Coach and support architects in training by sharing your experience, best practices and offering them guidance and advice.
  *   Setting up data governance practice: Responsibilities include establishing policies, processes, and frameworks to ensure effective management and utilization of data assets based on industry standards and best practices.
  *   collaborating with stakeholders:  to define data standards, promoting data privacy and compliance, and implementing governance mechanisms.
  *   Data Migration Roadmap: Provide expert guidance and advisory support as a Data Architect in the development of a comprehensive roadmap for the migration of the organization's data platform and reporting systems.
  *   Take part in the existing governance practices within the architecture Way of Working (e.g. PI planning, Quarterly business review, Architecture Center of Excellence, daily standups, peer reviews, …)
  *   Act as a steward for the new data platform: providing ongoing guidance and support to ensure the proper implementation of governance principles and best practices. Monitor and assess compliance with governance policies and provide recommendations for continuous improvement.

Your profile:
The ideal candidate for an Enterprise Architect position should have:


  *   Degree in Engineering, Informatics, Computer Science, or equivalent professional experience.
  *   Professional working proficiency in English and either French or Dutch.
  *   Minimum of 5 years of experience as an Enterprise Architect or in a similar role.
  *   Proven experience as an Enterprise Data Architect, including expertise in establishing Data Governance practices.
  *   Strong technical proficiency in analyzing and evaluating data platforms on AWS and Azure.
  *   Familiarity with modern data integration techniques, data warehousing, and data modeling.
  *   Up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in data architecture.
  *   Excellent coaching and mentoring abilities to support the growth and development of team members.
  *   Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to engage effectively with various stakeholders.
  *   Strong interest in both business and IT topics, acting as a bridge between the two domains.
  *   Certification in relevant technologies and frameworks (e.g., AWS, Azure, TOGAF) is a plus.
  *   Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience in an international project and program environment.


Assignment for 3 months with possible extension up to 6 months

Alvast bedankt voor jullie input.

Mvg,

Mireille De Keuleneir
Key Account Manager

body:
Beste P&C,

Voor Pfizer Puurs zoeken we een Data Engineer gerelateerd aan Learning &Development Data Management.

Department: Product Support
Service: Data Engineer (Medior)
Segment: Professional Services

Start Date: 31\/07\/2023
End Date: 31\/07\/2024


Job Description:

As a data engineer you will be responsible to fully digitize and automate everything related to L&D data mgmt., KPI’s, metrics, and so on. In doing so, we want to establish a learning culture while moving towards predictive scenario’s when it comes to resource planning. These dashboards\/health checks provide vital information during various production meetings - boosting efficiency, effectiveness, speed to competence and workforce flexibility. Next to that it’s also crucial to maintain training compliance at all times. You'll consult stakeholders across site (not only L&D but also operations) to determine the user requirements and document functional specifications. You will team up with Global\/Digital counterparts in creating and fully digitizing\/automating all training related data. You work closely with experts in all Puurs departments to roll out these analytics across site.

Department
The global supply site in Puurs Sint-Amands is Pfizer's biggest and most advanced production and packaging facility in the world. During Covid, the site increased its production capacity from approximately 400 million injectable doses to over a billion. The Learning & Development department played a crucial role in this expansion and will continue to do so in the coming years (on December 2th 2022, Pfizer announced it would invest a further 1.2 billion euros into its site at Puurs). Using technology, innovation and sound project management practices, L&D Puurs contributes to building the future of the site.

Culture

Technology impacts everything we do. Pfizer’s digital and ‘data first’ strategy focuses on implementing impactful and innovative technology solutions. Ownership is an essential attitude of every colleague. We want to excel today while shaping tomorrow and act pro-actively. Courage, excellence, equity and joy are our core values. Teamwork is the cornerstone of our organization, while the well-being of our colleagues is a focus point. The next generation workplace initiative, aims to transform Pfizer Puurs to one of the most attractive, diverse and inclusive employers in the region.

Job Profile

Must Have
· Bachelor\/Master degree in computer science, IT or engineering or related experience
· 3 years related work experience (less might be considered depending on previous experience and educational background)
· Experience with functional and object oriented programming languages (JavaScript, Python, etc.).
· Analytical mindset, pragmatic problem solver
· Fluent in Dutch and English
· Strong communication skills, both verbally and in writing

Nice To Have
· Basic understanding of lean manufacturing
· Experience with LMS systems (SAP Successfactors)
· Experience with protocols to extract data from (LMS & DMS) systems
· Experience with automation and manufacturing systems (PLC, SCADA), basic understanding of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES)
· Experience with data engineering, data lakes, data warehouses and ETL (Snowflake, Apache Airflow)
· Basic understanding of Historian Software (Osisoft Pi)
· Basic understanding of message bus technologies (Active MQ, Kafka), relational databases (Postgres, MSSQL, Oracle) , non-relational databases and object storage
· Previously worked in the pharmaceutical or another strongly regulated industry

Alvast dank voor jullie feedback!
Vriendelijke groeten,
Steven
label: DATA_ENGINEER

ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB

VOORRANG AAN VASTE WERKNEMERS



Hallo collega’s,



Voor Euroclear zoeken we een Data Engineer (Data Monetization) (3414) die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:





 Job Info

____________________________________________



Organization: Euroclear SA\/NV

Location: Belgium

Full or Part Time

Target start date: 8\/1\/23

Duration (for temporary positions only): 12 months

Watch duty: No

Shifts?: No

Travel Required: No

Weekend work: No



 Job Details

_________________________________________________



What’s the job?

Is data technology your passion? Can you autonomously design, develop and deploy data pipelines, making sure these pipelines are filled with qualitative data which serve as an input for our machine learning engineers? Then this is the job for you.



In this role, You collaborate closely with our machine learning engineers and\/or cloud architects on projects, always with a quality focused, end-to-end approach. You will support the reporting teams in the data exploration and data preparation phases, Implement data quality controls. You will liaise with IT infrastructure teams to address infrastructure issues and to ensure that the components and software used on the platform are all consistent.



Join Euroclear

Euroclear is a financial services company that specializes in the settlement of securities transactions, as well as the safekeeping and asset servicing of these securities. We are located in Brussels and several major cities in Europe and around the world. We are deeply convinced that diversity of talents, backgrounds and opinions is a key to success, by encouraging engagement, energy and innovation.



You will join the AIR (Analytics, Insight and Reporting tribe) in GDC division. You will join our dedicated in-house team of data-specialists using a pragmatic best-tool-for-the-job approach to optimise our hybrid infrastructure. With a strong focus on DataOps and MLOps we firmly believe in robust and production-ready solutions being an essential part to our work. The result? Our team provides an ecosystem of data-driven products to internal and external consumers.



You will excel in building digital data-driven solutions and infrastructure and become an architectural genius that effortlessly designs, develops and deploys infrastructure and data pipelines . Our languages? Java,  Scala, Spark and SQL. When not coding, we speak English as we have colleagues from all around the world, you will join a truly international team.



The Skills

  *   You have experience with analysis and creation of data pipelines, data architecture, ETL\/ELT development and with processing structured and unstructured data, including post-go live activities Ability to analyse data, identify issues (e.g. gaps, inconsistencies) and you can troubleshoot them
  *   You have experience using data stored in RDBMSs and experience or some understanding of NoSQL databases
  *   You have 3 to 5 years of experience of Scala and Spark, and a good understanding of the Hadoop ecosystem including Hadoop file formats like Parquet and ORC
  *   You can write performant Scala code and SQL statements and can design  modular, future proof solutions that are fit for purpose
  *   You are autonomous in working on Unix based systems.
  *   You have a true agile mindset, capable and willing to take on tasks outside of her\/his core competencies to help the team
  *   Experience in working with customers to identify and clarify requirements
  *   You have a strong interest in FINTECH and technologies related data.
  *   You have strong communication skills.



 Nice to haves

  *   You have experience with open source technologies used in Data Analytics like Spark, Hive, HBase, Kafka, …
  *   Knowledge of Cloudera, IBM mainframe
  *   You speak English fluently, any other language is a plus.



You are based in Belgium or are able to come to our offices in Brussels once a week.





Indien jullie geschikte kandidaten hebben, ontvang ik graag hun beschikbaarheid, CV en kostprijs.



Alvast bedankt!

body:
ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB

VOORRANG AAN VASTE WERKNEMERS

Hallo collega’s,

Voor DPG Media zijn we nog steeds op zoek naar een Data Engineer (Aimwel - Amsterdam) die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:
Functieomschrijving
Aimwel is een nieuw bedrijf onder moederbedrijf DPG Media, wat een software as a service (SaaS) oplossing aanbied die het adverteren van vacatures automatiseert en tegelijkertijd optimaliseert. Onze klanten zijn hoofdzakelijk vacature websites over de hele wereld, maar ook Nederlandse klanten zoals Nationale vacaturebank en Intermediair. De vacatures van onze klanten worden automatisch geadverteerd op andere platformen zoals Facebook en andere vacature websites (bijvoorbeeld Talent.com).

We zijn een echte scale-up wat zorgt voor een platte organisatie en een hecht team waarbij veel vrijheid is om eigen projecten op te pakken. Na een zeer goede start van het jaar zijn wij bezig om veel nieuwe klanten aan te sluiten, waardoor wij het met de huidige capaciteit in ons data team niet gaan redden. Dit betekent dat we op data gebied veel werk hebben op zowel operationeel niveau (voor onze bestaande klanten) als ontwikkel niveau (nieuwe klanten en nieuwe features). Hiervoor zijn we op zoek naar een versterking van ons data team in de vorm van een medior of senior freelancer. Je zou een team versterken van 4 data-engineers en 1 analytics-engineer.

Waar hebben wij versterking voor nodig?:
- Bestaande data-processen verbeteren (ETLs, datamodellen, etc.)
- De opzet van nieuwe infra-structuur en nieuwe processen
- Een goede verbeteringsslag op onze infastructure as code (snowflake in terraform)
- Veel ongeplande dingen! (we zijn een scale-up dus we hebben relatief korte planningen)
Functievereisten
Welke stack hebben we:
- AWS
- Snowflake
- Airflow
- Python
- DBT (data build tool)
- Dash

Wat zoeken we:
- Medior\/Senior data-engineer (3+ jaar werkervaring in python)
- Ervaring met zoveel mogelijk van onze stack
- Flexibel in mindset en empathische samenwerker
- In staat kennis over te brengen op andere teamleden



Indien jullie geschikte kandidaten hebben ontvang ik graag hun beschikbaarheid, CV en kostprijs.

Alvast hartelijk bedankt.

body:
Hi Collega’s,

Ik ben op zoek naar een Data Engineer\/BI dev engineer voor een invalbeurt van 6 maanden bij onze klant Galapagos.  Wie kan helpen?

First & foremost: de kandidaten moeten ervaring hebben in een AWS omgeving om snel operationeel te geraken. De missie wordt combinatie van data engineering capabilities en data warehousing ervaring. Ervaren DWH consultant die noties hebben van pure data engineering zijn van harte welkom. De front-end kant (visualisatie in Tableau, Qlik, PowerBI, Spotfire) is hier van veel minder belang.

De omschrijving:

Galapagos is looking for a data & analytics engineer to support the development of the data platform and build data-driven products by using both clinical as non-clinical data.

The main objective of the data engineer – Business Intelligence developer is to build the framework that supports the entire lifecycle of data-driven products through data pipelines. This means you develop the ETL flows to efficiently retrieve the necessary data from various sources, transform data according to the pre-defined business logic and integrate data into the data platform. Next to that you create data models and Data Marts. Data quality and robustness of the ETL processes are of great importance here.

You will also participate in the further development of the data platform, which provides data & insights to various business stakeholders.

Technical skills

  *   At least 5 years of relevant work experience in data engineering\/data operations and data warehousing
  *   Hands-on experience with handling different file types (CSV, XLSX, JSON, TXT) in Python
  *   Proficient in using the Django framework for data modeling and SQL transformations (DDL generation of data sources, script generation & logging)
  *   Good knowledge of the AWS data stack & services (such as S3, Lambda & RDS)
  *   Familiarity with planning, implementing and correctly executing the scheduling of the ETL flows to ensure they fit in the overall data platform design
  *   Hands-on experience in multidimensional modeling and Data Mart creation (Kimball)
  *   Familiarity with Confluence & Jira
  *   Ability to troubleshoot and debug data pipeline issues
  *   Experience with SQL (Postgres) is an advantage

Management skills

  *   Strong analytical and communication skills
  *   Critical, accurate and correct
  *   Familiarity with acting as part of an agile team and participating in daily stand-ups
  *   Strong collaboration skills
  *   Can work in a structured way and is able to maintain the documentation on Confluence
  *   Attach great importance to privacy & ethics
  *   Able to communicate fluently in English (Dutch is an advantage)

ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB
VOORRANG AAN VASTE WERKNEMERS


Hallo collega’s,

Voor DPG Media zijn we op zoek naar een Medior Data Engineer (Aimwel - Amsterdam) die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:

Job description


Aimwel is een nieuw bedrijf onder moederbedrijf DPG Media, wat een software as a service (SaaS) oplossing aanbied die het adverteren van vacatures automatiseert en tegelijkertijd optimaliseert. Onze klanten zijn hoofdzakelijk vacature websites over de hele wereld, maar ook Nederlandse klanten zoals Nationale vacaturebank en Intermediair. De vacatures van onze klanten worden automatisch geadverteerd op andere platformen zoals Facebook en andere vacature websites (bijvoorbeeld Talent.com<https:\/\/safelink.com\/?url=http%3A%2F%2Ftalent.com%2F&data=05%7C01%##################%40email.com%7C2271c6b42a3241867a1608db1323882e%7C49c3d703357947bfa8887c913fbdced9%7C0%7C0%7C638124815642558196%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ms%2FX5ZdQxRqauzsvOt163642f58T2ClAaMsVu27HQ64%3D&reserved=0>).

We zijn een echte scale-up wat zorgt voor een platte organisatie en een hecht team waarbij veel vrijheid is om eigen projecten op te pakken. Na een zeer goede start van het jaar zijn wij bezig om veel nieuwe klanten aan te sluiten, waardoor wij het met de huidige capaciteit in ons data team niet gaan redden. Dit betekent dat we op data gebied veel werk hebben op zowel operationeel niveau (voor onze bestaande klanten) als ontwikkel niveau (nieuwe klanten en nieuwe features). Hiervoor zijn we op zoek naar een versterking van ons data team in de vorm van een medior of senior freelancer. Je zou een team versterken van 3 data-engineers en 1 analytics-engineer.

Waar hebben wij versterking voor nodig?:

  *   Bestaande data-processen verbeteren (ETLs, datamodellen, etc.)
  *   De opzet van nieuwe infra-structuur en nieuwe processen
  *   Een goede verbeteringsslag op onze infastructure as code (snowflake in terraform)
  *   Veel ongeplande dingen! (we zijn een scale-up dus we hebben relatief korte planningen)




Job requirements
Welke stack hebben we:

  *   AWS
  *   Snowflake
  *   Airflow
  *   Python
  *   DBT (data build tool)
  *   Dash


  *   Medior\/Senior data-engineer (3+ jaar werkervaring in python)
  *   Ervaring met zoveel mogelijk van onze stack
  *   Flexibel in mindset en empathische samenwerker
  *   In staat kennis over te brengen op andere teamleden


Indien jullie geschikte kandidaten hebben ontvang ik graag hun beschikbaarheid, CV en kostprijs.
Alvast hartelijk bedankt.

De Cronos Groep nv
Veldkant 33A, 2550 Kontich

Description
 Flink developer – Fraud Detection

Willing to push the boundaries with us for a more sustainable world?
Have you been bitten by DevOps principles? And do you enjoy performing sprints as part of an Agile team? Have you ever wondered how to defend against or reduce cyber risks? Or already have experience in those fields?
In that case, you may be the IT wizard we need to bring our digital ambitions to life. You’ll contribute to innovations that benefit millions of clients.
You will join the IT Production Security department, its mission is to :
·    Transform security into a strategic value-driver (i.e. enable innovation and enhance customers’ trust in our services)
·    Have security integrated in the early design phase of products and services ('secure by design')
·    Root security deeply in our corporate DNA

As part of the Agile Impulse organization, the Security Tribe provides best-in-class security capabilities ready to be used by the other tribes; specifically in the areas of Employee Access, Fraud, Key Certificate Management and Partner IAM.

Your future job
As Developer, you join the enthusiastic and multidisciplinary Fraud Management team. Together, you develop qualitative applications contributing to our services security used by our Clients: an exciting and versatile challenge!

  *   You develop new functionalities of the squad services from the client’s requirements definition to the deployment in PROD.
  *   You help to define the development plan and acceptance criteria out of those requirements.
  *   You design, build, test and maintain the new features with high performance, reusable, reliable, and secure code.
  *   You focus on the best possible performance, quality, and uptime of the application by:
     *   Identifying & solving bottlenecks or bugs.
     *   Ensuring High Code quality and organization.
     *   Making smart automatization.


Highlight your strengths
You’re the physical embodiment of the scrum values: involvement, focus, openness, and respect, with a good dose of courage to boot.
·    You’re inquisitive and driven—and you’re always on the ball.
·    You thrive in a team environment, happily sharing your knowledge and insights.
·    You are quick to make connections and dare to question everything that deserves it.
·    You’re able to work under pressure 😊.
·    You always search to improve yourself by learning new technologies, methodologies and\/or how to be a better you.
·    You are excited by having responsibilities, making decisions & vulgarizing them.

You have a great knowledge of English. Dutch\/French knowledge is a plus.
You have (at least) 5 years’ experience as developer.
You have (at least) a strong interest in the Security domain such as the Fraud Detection.

You know your way around:

  *   Security embedding in the DevOps pipeline.
  *   Continuous Integration\/Continuous Delivery.
  *   Clean code principles and apply them effectively.
  *   Test driven development.
  *   Scripting and incident handling.

You surprise us with your experience in the following technologies\/programming languages:

  *   (Most important): Java, (Scala), Flink, Kafka, Oracle, Linux
  *   Spring (Boot)
  *   Gitlab
  *   Jenkins
  *   Node.JS
  *   SonarQube
  *   Fortify
  *   Maven

ENKEL RECHTSTREEKS, GEEN TUSSENPARTIJEN AUB

VOORKEUR VOOR VASTE MEDEWERKERS





Hallo collega’s,



Voor Swift zoeken we een Data Engineer - Customer Experience die voldoet aan volgende beschrijving:



Gewenste startdatum: 15\/02\/2023

Einddatum: 01\/05\/2023 - Mogelijkheid tot verlenging met 6 maanden







Job Summary


The department Customer Experience’s purpose is to take away friction for our Customers and employees and create a better experience.

The Voice of the Customer, Customer insights team, is hiring a Data Engineer to set up and improve data streams to a central data hub, from which service delivery performance data can be analysed.


The job requires working in close collaboration with the various services delivery teams as well as key Customer Experience Transformation programme teams such as the customer journey teams.


Key tasks include

  *   design, build and integrate data pipes from multiple sources where services data is available, but not yet exploitable
  *   In collaboration with the team, you will need to define data ingestion rules and data management tools, so that large amounts of data can be analysed by business analysts and data scientists or put available to business teams through self-service mechanisms.

This is a unique opportunity for a team player who likes new challenges and wants to develop her\/his data engineering and mining skills, as well as networking skills to deliver top quality work with impact on the future of a world-class customer services. In this role you will be exposed to SWIFT’s strategic programs, and be working closely with both CeX and services teams to deliver insights and value to their objectives.


Job Description


What to expect:


• Define data analysis use cases with stakeholders in services or CeX teams (users or business analysts)

• Set up data pipes to get data from various systems in the right date and formats where needed.

• Set up data use cases using existing data feeds and points in platforms such as OASIS, iRiS, Watch;

• Cleaning process of data


  *   Build an automatic monitoring of the cleaning flow
  *   Define “self-services” dashboards and analysis for direct usage by stakeholders


Once the cleaning process has been concluded per request and\/or project, perform Data analysis to turn data into insights in collaboration with the business teams.

Understanding and maintaining our current analytic platform and enhancing dashboards, adding new \/ revised dashboards, perhaps?

Our current platform is providing advanced analytics insights based on the replication of database information, the data engineer will ensure the end-to-end replication flow is running and monitored.

  *    Follow-up on the mandatory COTS upgrades
  *   Upgrade of R and Python libraries complying with the company security policies
  *   The scope of our analytics activities will be extended to other services areas and platforms, and will require some new infrastructure\/tooling to be set up
  *   Explore and identify the most suitable solution in Operational or financial data warehouses and\/or data lakes

This solution will integrate data coming from various data sources, and the data engineer role would be to contribute to the definition and set-up of the best storage structure, for both our Data warehouse and data lake, as well as a future data management platform flow the data into our warehouse (stream and flow). Setup a report server whereby self-service dashboard can be accessed by the business\/delivery users, without having to install local client software or distribute static excel based reports (e.g. Shiny server)


What will make you successful:


• University degree or equivalent

• Min. 3 years experience as Data Engineer

• Passionate about data analysis, data engineering and science.

• Excellent analytics skills on large data sets and have the ability to synthesis into key findings

• Knowledge of databases

• Knowledge of SQL, Hadoop, Kafka

• Knowledge of programming languages R, R Studio, Python (what about Python libraries, like Pandas, NumPy etc)?

• Knowledge of data visualization tools - Tableau \/ Microstrategies\/Shiny\/Kibana)

• Build collaborative networks with key stakeholders.

• Excellent interpersonal skills to deal with a wide range of internal customers and stakeholders.

• Experience with SWIFT products and services either from a technical services, support or business perspective is a strong asset

• A team player, willing to work in a multicultural environment

• Fluent in English

Alvast hartelijk bedankt.

Dear,

Role category -
Role profile
 S5 - Data
 Data Engineer - Senior
Job title
 Data Engineer
Work location
 BRU.-MONTAGNE DU PARC\/WARANDEBERG
 MONTAGNE DU PARC 3
 1000 BRUXELLES
Start date
 asap
End date
 29\/12\/2023
Description

Job Title
Data modelling \/ Datavault engineer
Mission context
The DataHub-tribe is one of the key components of the Data department, to help developing and rolling out the bank-wide BI and Data strategy at BNP Paribas Fortis.  Its mission is to service all metiers and functions of the bank with transversal BI solutions (front and backend developments) & tools. In doing so, the DataHub tribe will contribute  to the spreading of the new data governance and “Know your data” culture throughout BNPP Fortis.
Function  description


  *   Establishing and deploying Standard & guidelines
·       Set out rules and guidelines and standards and\/or continuously improve the existing ones to be applied throughout the whole Data Hub team.  Coach and assist the BI analysts and their customers in the usage of these S&G.
·       Active Participation in the CoP (Community of Practices)
·       This mission is specifically oriented to the set-up, the foundations, the ingestion  and extraction of data on a CSL-layer (corporate structured layer) to built on the BNPPF big data platform  while the EDM-model and datavault  techniques



Create awareness on Data Modelling

·       Promote modeling techniques that makes sense
·       Make some technical recommendation for physical implementation
·       Training sessions for analysts
·       Provide daily assistance



Assess Quality of Data Models

·       Review and ensure the correct application of the rules\/guidelines \/standards\/templates by the Business Intelligence team as well as their third party suppliers . This involves close collaboration with data architects, as well as detailed knowledge of and strict adherence to BNP Paribas Fortis standards.
·       Monitor and report to the application responsible and management on a regular basis about the data modelling activity and KYD culture.
Language requirements
Dutch
Sound knowledge is an asset
French
Sound knowledge is an asset
English
Sound knowledge
Education
Bachelor\/Master ‘s degree in IT or Business engineering or equivalent by professional experience
Certification
n\/a
Agile Requirements
An analyst involved in Agile projects must have the "Agile mindset" which implies:
·       a positive attitude and pragmatism
·       thirst for knowledge: Agile is about learning and adapting. Knowledge sharing is key to success.
·       The goal of team success: Agile is about the success of the team, no individual success or heroic behavior. It is more important for the team to succeed than for the individual to have completed his\/her tasks.
·       There is no failure, only feedback: Agile is about taking everything as lessons, adjusting actions based on the feedback, resulting in continuous improvement.



Beyond the roles:  Agile teams are cross-functional.  All required disciplines are represented in the team (analysis, development, testing, … ). However, although team members have a primary role representing a discipline, they are expected to take on other roles and contribute to other disciplines  whenever it helps towards reaching the sprint goal.
Required experience \/ knowledge
You have at least 4 years of relevant experience in Data Modelling \/ Datavault
Technical experience
mandatory

·       Knowledge of DWH data modelling (i.e. Kimball , Inman, datavault)
·       Be able to use modelling tools like PowerDesigner, IBM InfoSphere Data Architect, ArchiMate  or any other tool on the market.

·       Databases: Oracle

·       Solution design - Functional design of Data Hub or Data Lake or a modern Data Warehouse (Streaming based)

preferable


  *   Experience in banking sector - Banking industry specific data model.
  *   Streaming based data ingestion
  *   Kafka and Flink
Business experience
mandatory

·       Experience in Data Modelling, the conceptual, logical and physical data models and databases
·       Experience in translating customer\/functional needs into data design.
·       Knowledge of Agile Methodology and project management
preferable
Specific requirement for agile: practical experience with Scrum
Soft skills

·       Good analytical and problem solving skills.
·       Quick self-starter, pro-active attitude
·       Team player  always ready to share, train or provide support to others.
·       Autonomy, commitment and perseverance
·       Flexible, accurate & control minded.
·       Ability to work in a dynamic and multi-cultural environment
·       Ability to deliver results respecting deadlines
·       Good oral and written communication. Ability to turn advanced technical topics and industry jargon into easy-to-understand information .
·       Quality driven and cost avoidance minded
·       Able to handle changing priorities
·       Customer focus
·       Passionate about data



 Please submit your candidate in the attached template!



Tx!

Business development & Account Management

body:
Collega’s,

Voor KBC zoeken we een Data Engineer:

The 'red thread' within our SAFE Data trains is the development of and support for DI solutions. We set up Big Data solutions with their specific tools & technologies (Python, Spark, AWS, ...). With the evolution towards a data driven organization, the intensive use of commercial data and data analysis has become a strategic core competence of KBC. Together with our business partners we are building and managing multiple new high-quality data layers (Commercial data, Risk data, etc.) that contain correct and consistent data, based on unambiguous definitions, compliant with the new GDPR legislation and that can be accessed at the right time in the right form and through the right channel. For the governance of that data, we are implementing Collibra as standard governance tool for KBC Group. Collibra will also become the master for all the metadata needed to drive all our Big Data- related pipelines.

For this implementation we are looking for additional a motivated Senior Data Engineer - Big Data with expert knowledge of the tools and technologies used in Big Data such as Python scripting Apache Spark , AWS (Lambda, S3, IAM, Athena,...) I,ETL concepts, REST API, setting up pipelines, Apache Airflow, CICD, ... . Some knowledge of Collibra is definitely a plus

As a Senior Data Engineer
- Big Data, you and your colleagues will be responsible for the technical and architectural design and implementation (both creation and maintenance) of the Meta Data Repository. This MDR will be fed by meta data
input from Collibra and other KBC systems and the MDR will reproduce the collected meta data in a structured format that can be used by ingestion process, GDPR process, ...
• Making together with our system architect a technical design of the MDR •Developing with focus on test driven approach the MDR
• Technical implementation of new data feeds from and towards the MDR, performing ETL tasks and following up on job-scheduling, release planning and knowledge transfer and retention.
• Compiling all necessary system and user documentation • Further extend, support and manage the MDR.

Expert knowledge of the tools and technologies used in Big Data such as Python scripting Apache Spark , AWS (Lambda, S3, IAM, Athena,...),ETL concepts, REST API, setting up pipelines, Apache Airflow, CICD, ... . Some knowledge of Collibra is definitely a plus

Dutch is required!!

Locatie: Leuven
Periode: ASAP – 31\/03\/2023

Met vriendelijke groet,

Thomas Van Huffel

Business Park King Square

body:
Collega’s,

Voor KBC zoeken we een Cloud platform engineer in a data analytics context

What does this function mean?
KBC group is currently creating a new big data platform in AWS. On top of the platform, we are building a platform that focuses on supporting data science and other technical computing workflows.
You will participate in this effort, as a valuable team player, to analyse, design, and implement the platform in close collaboration with data scientists.
What do we expect from you?
As a platform engineer for data science, you are responsible for engineering a well architected data science platform with particular emphasis in interactive computing and highly automated model lifecycle management
based on MLOps. Main considerations for the design include security, maintainability, flexibility, user-friendliness and integration between components on the platform.
You work closely with data scientists to understand their functional needs and translate them in an actual solution. Then, you rapidly iterate over the solution based on frequent feedback from data scientists.
Due to how the platform is used in the group, you are also responsible for documenting guidelines for future platform operators.

Your strength?
An ideal candidate should have:
- Good working knowledge of cloud computing in general, and AWS specifically (AWS IAM, EC2, S3,VPC) As KBC has chosen for AWS as a cloud service provider we often mention their technology in this job description. Decent Cloud experience (doesn ‘t matter which Cloud, as long as it is one of the big three (GCP, Azure or AWS)) and Infrastructure-as-Code experience is also valuable.
- Other AWS services such as Cognito, Lambda, CloudWatch, ECR, Athena etc
- Basic understanding of AWS products related to machine learning (AWS SageMaker, MLFlow)
- Experience with Infrastructure-as-Code (IAC) tools such as Terraform, Pulumi, AWS CloudFormation etc
- Kubernetes \/ Helm
- Good knowledge of user management (authentication and authorization) with AWS products and OSS solutions
- Good grasp of big data ecosystem and tooling especially Apache Spark and related technologies
- Good verbal and written communication skill in English
- Willingness to work in close collaboration with data scientists and other engineers from different teams
- An ability to work in a highly dynamic environment
- A can-do attitude to cope with non-technical constraints

Locatie: Leuven
Periode: ASAP – 31\/12\/2023

body:
Beste collega’s,

Voor een overheidsklant regio Brussel (Anderlecht) zijn we op zoek naar een Senior Project Manager. Meer info:

Gewenste startdatum: 04/03/2024
Voorlopige einddatum: 31/12/2024
Regime: Voltijds
Locatie: Brussel (Anderlecht)
Talen: NL of FR + ENG
Remote/onsite: 2d onsite, 3d remote

Omschrijving
The primary role of the Project Manager is to work closely with customers to drive the successful delivery of IT projects

  *   1st, 2nd Line Support and Technical Field services
  *   End user Services: Engineering and Device Platform Management
  *   Problem- & Change Management and Business Service Management
  *   Request, Fulfillment, Invoicing, Tendering
  *   Quality Assurance & Continuous Improvement
  *   Facility Security Management for Safety, Security and Building technologies
  *   Telecom: Telephony solutions, Radio Solutions
  *   Infrastructure: Infrastructure, Nework and Computing
The Project Manager will facilitate the management of scope for the customer’s requirements, plan implementations and deliver to the planned scope and budget.

Verantwoordelijkheden

  *   Leads project delivery from beginning to end;
  *   Define project scope, goals and deliverables that support business goals in collaboration with management and stakeholders;
  *   Develop full-scale project plans and associated communications documents following the company’s standard;
  *   Draft and submit budget proposals, and recommend subsequent budget changes where necessary as per defined process;
  *   Ensure that project meets it’s deliverables in agreed schedule, as per the scope, within stipulated budget and as per the quality standards;
  *   Effectively communicate project expectations to team lead and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion;
  *   Ensures project or service scope and deliverables are defined and agreed with all relevant parties;
  *   Liaise with client and IT Teams on an ongoing basis
  *   Diagnoses and evaluates potential risks and issues throughout the project and executes appropriate plans to mitigate them. Reports regularly to the Team Lead and Stakeholders with regard to risks,
  *   Be a key member of the overall Operations Team

Kennis & ervaring

  *   15 + years relevant experience with project management in different domains
  *   Strong affinity with enterprise technology and its complexity is an added value, like active directory, Computing, storage, cloud, network
  *   Relevant experience and proven record in one of the following domains as PM :
     *   Windows platform (8, 10, 11)
     *   Mobile devices (smartphones, tablets,…)
     *   Infrastructure (network, storage, computing, cloud)
  *   Experience within Public Sector will also be considered an asset
  *   Recognises and applies our Core Values: Professionalism, Respect, Entrepreneurship, Corporation and Leadership
  *   Demonstrated “can do” work ethic coupled with effective time management and ability to overcome ambiguously or under-defined problems
  *   Knowledge of Agile delivery methodology and SAFe (Essentials) are considered an asset
  *   ITIL Certification is a MUST. Project Methodology Certification is a MUST.
  *   Can facilitate Steerco, project update meetings and guide resources.
  *   Possesses the ability to communicate, present and produce documentation on various levels for differing audiences
  *   Proficient in Dutch or French, and English.

Als je een geschikte kandidaat hebt dan hoor ik het graag.

Met vriendelijke groeten,
Wout

body:
Hallo collega’s,

Voor Acerta ben ik op zoek naar een medior test engineer.

De Test Engineer zal ingezet worden om de Analisten in het Connect team te ontlasten op vlak van testing.

Hieronder kan je de vacatureomschrijving terugvinden. Graag een zo goed mogelijke match op de verantwoordelijkheden en functievereisten.

Locatie is Leuven (naast station) en 2 dagen/week op kantoor.
Fulltime opdracht – lange termijn
Indien kandidaten graag CV, kostprijs en beschikbaarheid.

Prettig weekend,
Stefan


Functieomschrijving:
Als Software Test Engineer vervul je een cruciale rol om ervoor te zorgen dat onze software naadloos functioneert. Je verdeelt je tijd tussen bestaande en nieuwe projecten en bent actief op zoek naar manieren om de software uitgebreid en waar mogelijk geautomatiseerd te testen.
Met jouw geduldige en gestructureerde aanpak zorg je ervoor dat geen enkel scenario over het hoofd wordt gezien. Kwaliteit staat voorop, en je bent leergierig. Jij zorgt ervoor dat het systeem stabiel en betrouwbaar blijft. Je bent communicatief sterk en werkt nauw samen met analisten, ontwikkelaars, product managers, testcoördinators en andere teamleden om de best mogelijke resultaten te behalen.

Verantwoordelijkheden:

  *   Maken van verbetervoorstellen om onze test coverage/strategy te verbeteren
  *   Opstellen van testplannen op basis van specificaties en functionele vereisten
  *   Uitvoeren van handmatige en geautomatiseerde tests op onze Java- en web-gebaseerde software toepassing
  *   Inpassen van de tests in de bestaande Github Actions CI/CD pipelines
  *   Identificeren, registreren en bijhouden van bugs om de kwaliteit van software te waarborgen
  *   Rapporteren over de voortgang van testactiviteiten aan de testcoördinator
  *   Ondersteuning van UAT testen met business testers
  *   Waar mogelijk automatisering toevoegen aan het testproces

     *   Creëren, beheren en uitvoeren van geautomatiseerde testscripts

Functievereisten:

  *   Minimaal 3 jaar ervaring als Software Test Engineer.
  *   Analytisch denkvermogen en aandacht voor detail.
  *   Effectieve communicatie en samenwerkingsvaardigheden.
  *   Kennis van testautomatiseringstools zoals Selenium of iets gelijkwaardigs
  *   Kennis van BDD methodologie is een plus
  *   Uitschrijven, verfijnen en uitvoeren van geautomatiseerde testscenarios met Cucumber (Java; BDD)
  *   Gebruik van Git
  *   Gebruik van een IDE (zoals IntelliJ)
  *   Basiskennis SQL



Stefan 
Managing Partner Cronos Leuven

[id:image001.png@01D245C3.F2B71630]

Gaston Geenslaan 11-B4
3001 Heverlee

M: 
Cronosleuven.be
LinkedIn: be.linkedin.com/in/stefancroimans
twitter: @SCroimans
